










































































































































































































































































































Adaa Aa-me Abram-para lalo: Nena kantri-para nena onaa-para nena apaa amenu page gimoa. Neme watoade supara paina.
Neme nemadare ruru adapu ma-ralalua. Goa pua ne ma-epealua. Nena biri ma-adaayalua. Ne madaare onaa adaapu ma-epealua.
Ne epea paliminuri nimu page epea palua. Ne waea paliminuri nimu page waea palua. Ne madaare go suna onaa rayo ma-epealua.
Abrame-me Adaa Aa-na agaa pagoa ame-na si Lot rapu pisipi. Nipu mali 75 patinaloa Aran su gimoa pisa.
Nipu-na ore Sera-para ame-na si Lot-para nipuna kogono onaa para oyae rayo-para Aran su-para kabisimi oyae rayo page mea pisimi. Gore nimu mo Kenan supara polalo pisimi. Goa pua nimu pua opapaisimi.
Abrame mo Sekem su-para ipua More adaa repena oak regepea pisa. Go raburi Kenan onaare go su-para asimi.
Adaa Aa Abram piri ipua lalo: Go suri nena madu ma-ralalide onaa katoa. Go pare Adaa Aa nipu piri ipisa rabu aana reke meda wariasa.
Go pare aemeare nipu nare ipula nane rudu Betel regepea pua sele ada go pare pisa. Betel nare pabala nane asa. Aire nare opala nane asa. Goa pua Adaa Aa-na aana reke meda warimea Adaa Aa-na bi loa lotu sa.
Go pare awa Abram nipu puamama pua Negep opapasa.
Go raburi go su-para reae adaa pabisada, Abram no Isip ata pisa. Gore mo reae ora adaa pabisa pulu.
Nipu Isip regepea ipisipi raburi, ore Sarai-para lalo: Nere ora epe ona meda yade.
Isip onaame ne adoa goa teme gore nipuna ore teme. Goa pua niri talimi pare nere pa ma-aalimi.
Goa peaga na baani lape. Go rabu nimumi ni waru surubalimi. Neme goa te rabu ni rabameali.
Abram Isip ipisa raburi Isip onaame mo ona epe ona meda adisimi.
Go raburi Pero-na kogono surube aanumi adoa, nimumi epe ona meda adoa ipulumalo Pero pua lakisimi. Gore nipu Perome mo ona pua meatepa loa nipuna ada-para aainasa
Abram-re Serana baani kone isapulu Abram waru surubisa. Go rabu Abram nipu mena sipisipi-para doki mena para gawanu meme menanuna ru wai lapona page, kemele menanu-para kogono onaa page kasa.
Goa pisa pare Adaa Aa-me yaina igi wae meda Pero-para nipuna onaa piri popenasa. Gore Pero-me Abram-na ore misa-pulu goa pisa.
Go rabu Pero-me Abram-para ipuloa lalo: Na ore yade lore akolo nalae pae?
Akepeada na baani epa laeya? Goane ni meawadega abiare nena ona wala mea. Goa pua mea pu.
Go rabu Pero-me nipu-na kogono aanu-para loa apo repaya-para nipuna oye rayo page nipuna epapenane wala pena pua rapatepa sa.
Go rabu Abram Isip awa wala Negep pisa. Ore-para nipuna oyae rayo page mea pisa. Lot page nipu rapu pisa.
Go raburi Abram-re gawana page gol silpa lapona page amonaki meda asa.
Oropere Negep gimoa Abram nipu sumeda-para puamama pua Betel epa opapasa. Nipumi abaripia sele ada Betel-para Ai lapona rikirana pisaya.
Go parere aana reke meda ririnane warisade pare. Gore Abram-me go pare Adaa Aa-na bi loa lotu sa.
Lot nipuna ruru-para nipuna kogono onaanu page Abram rapu pamisimi. Nipumi page gawa sipisipi meme menanu page adapu punisa.
Su regepesa pulu nipu lapo padane-para ape awi naisa.
Go su-parare Kenan ruru-para Peris ruru page asimi. Go rabu Abram-para Lot lapona mena surube aanumi ratu yawala-pasimi.
Go rabu Abram-me Lot-para lalo: Sana rikirana ratu nayawapana, sare aaraya yapulu sana kogono aanumi page ratu nayawena.
Suri dina apo iyada, abia sare apupapana rana-paliade nanere meania. Medane ne palidare gore medanere ni pono.
Lot-me adamonisa pare mo Jordan suri paune ipa segene su epe meda isa. Adaa Aa-na maapumi adesa. Go suri Soar regepea isapulu Isip sumi adesa. Go raburi Adaa Aa-me Sodom Gomora lapo ambi natiaina.
Mo aa lapo apupaisipi pulu Lot-re nare ipulanane isa Jordan awaro paune suna pisa.
Abram Kenan su-para aisa raburi Lot-re Sodom ada kagure regepea nipuna sele ada mo Sodom awaro paune suna pisa.
Go rabu Sodom onaanumi waeanu waru pisimi, goa pua Adaa Aa-para page waea waru pisimi.
Lot aba penaloa Adaa Aa-me Abram-para lalo: Apo ayepare awa iniminipa, goa pua nare opea nane page, pabea nane page sula popea lapona page ada.
Apo adae su rayo, ne para nena madu maralalide ruru repara gudiayato.
Neme nena maralalide onaare, dorupa maralalua. Goa pua dipiaperupa page maralimi.
Apo surayo abi pua ada, go nepamuae su rayo ne gialo.
Gore Abram-me nipuna sele ada yokoria Hebron pua, mo Mamre repena oak puti regepea pua pisa. Goa pua Adaa Aa-na aana reke meda warisa.
Go raburi Amrapel Sina-na aamudu-para, Ariok Elasa-na aamudu-para, Kedolaoma Elam-na aamudu-para, Tidal Goim-na aamudu alare,
nimumi Bera Sodom-na aamudu-para, Bisa Gomora-na aamudu-para, Sinap Adma-na aamudu-para, Semeber Seboim-na aamudu-para, Bela (abiare Soar teme) gona aamudu-para go ruru ala rapu yada pula pisimi.
Go adare supuna yadapi aanuri, Sidim awaro paune suna kiritasimi. Go parere abiare Aipa Ipa teme.
Yada abi napi aware Kedolaoma-na rolopara mali 12 pirisimi. Wala malinare nimumi agaa napagesimi.
Wala mali meda popenalomea Kedolaoma rapu ralasimi aa mudunumi yada pua pumea go ruru wini pisimi. Repaim ruru Estorot Kanaim aisimi-para, Susi ruru Am adare-para pati page, mo Em ruru awaro paune su Kiriataim pati page,
mo Or ruru so Seir rudu pati page, ora pua mo kapune suna rugi Elparan pua pabo tu kiritisimi.
Goa pua nimumi wala pereketua En Mispat pisimi (go suri abiare Kedes teme). Goa pua aamudu malapu-na rurumi Ameleke-na su ada luabu pabotu rubisimi. Nimumi mo Asason Tama su-para pati Amori ruru page pabo rubisimi.
Go rabu Sodom Gomora lapo-para, Adma-para, Siboim-para, Bela nipuna bi meda Soa-para, go aamudununa yadapi aanumi, yada roborobo maga-ari ipua, Sidim awaro paune pare kiratawa,
Kedolaoma Elamana aamudu-para, Tidal Goimana aamudu-para, Amrapel Sinana aamudu-para, Ariok Elasana aamudu aala rapu yada pisimi. Gore nimu aamudu malapu rapu aamudu supu rapu yada pisimi.
Go raburi mo su Sidimire awaro paune kolta mi naaku adapu isa. Sodom Gomora lapona yadapi aanu-para nimuna aamudunu page pogola pisimi. Medalomare mo kolta mi naaku para lopisimi. Medalomare so rudu rudu pogola pisimi.
Mo aa mudu mala-na yadapi aanumi Sodom Gomora lapona oyae rayo mea pisimi.
Abram-na amena si Lot page go Sodom su-para aisa pulu, nipu para nipuna oyae rayo page mea pisimi.
Aa meda pogola pisa aamere, Hibru aa Abram apo remaa rayo epa lakesa. Go raburi Amorait aa meda Mamri-na repena puti para Abram rapu epa asa. Mamri para nipuna ame Esko-para Ane lapo, nimu Abram rapu upasimi.
Go rabu amena si Lot iyanumi mea puamelo pagisa raburi, nipumi nipuna ruru para asimi yada pape aanu para madini aanu page 318 yasa. Goa pua mo iyanu nimu Dan adare pua ratu kiritisimi.
Go ribare Abram-me nipuna aanu epa rumasa. Goa pua yadaa isimi. Go yada wini pua Damaskas regepea ae adare Oba regepea pua ratu kiritisimi.
Abram-me apo mea pisimide oyae rayo-para Amena si Lot-para ona-repa para pa onaanu page rayo wala mea ipisa.
Abram-me mo Kedolaoma rapu ralasimi ruru pabo ruboa ipisa raburi, Sodom-na aamudumi Abram mo Save awaro paune pare madaata ipisa. Abiare go parere Aamuduna Awaro Paune su teme.
Gote Adaa Aa mudu-na miru irae aa pris Melkisadek-me bret wain lapo mea ipisa. Nipuri Salem-na aamudu.
Nipumi Abram maepeata-awa goa sa: Su yaa lapo warini Gote Adaa Aa Mudu-me ne ora maepeaina.
Nena iyanu nena kipara mea giaa Gote Adaa Aa Mudu ora so mada pena. Go rabu Abram-me mo mea ipisa yaenu rayona 10 ap Melkisedek kasa.
Mo Sodom-na aa mudumi Abram para lalo: Oyae rayore nena meainaga niri onaa komea giaina.
Gore Abram-me mo Sodom-na aa mudu para lalo: Neme Adaa Aa, Gote Adaa Aa Mudu, su yalapo warisa Gote-para ora lalo:
nena nonapi yaere neme ogeda page namealua gore neme lalo: Abram ma-ama yaisu tepulu.
Ni yae meda na-mealua pare na aanumi aba nameya yaenu komea meano, go page nirapu puame aa repo Ane-para Eskol-para Mamre aalana komea nina iyanu rapu yada pamega go repare kalaina.
Goanu aba pinaloare, adea-podena Gote-na agaa gupa ipisa: Abram, pala naomape. Niri nena ralubi yade, Neme nere oyae waru gialua.
Gore Abram-me lalo: O Adaa Aa mudu neme niri ake gialiya? Niri naki meda namadu idega, Ninaa oyae rayore Eliesa gode Damaskas aame mealia.
Gorabu Abram-me lalo: Niri nogo-naki meda nagenede, goa pea pulu nina oyae rayore nina kogono aame rayo mealia.
Gorabu Adaa Aa-na agaa gupa ipisa: Nena oyae go aame namealia, pare nena madilide nakimi, nena oyae rayo mealia.
Nipu amanane mea pua goa sa: So yaa-para adasa, mada dipialiri so ubakedonu dipia. Gorabu goa sa: Neme maralalide onaare gorupa ralalimi.
Abram-me Adaa Aa-na sa agaa kone rulasa. Gorabu, Adaa Aa nipu redepone aa sa.
Wala Adaa Aa-me nipu-para goa sa: Niri ora Adaa Aa, neme ne Kaldia suna Ur piri mea epawadere, go su ora ne gudiyatalo pawade.
Gorabu Abram-me lalo: O Adaa Aa mudu, neme go su na yaadelore akepu mada makualuaya?
Gore Adaa Aa-me nipupara lalo: Ni piri mena gawa meda para meme mena wai-para, sipisipi yadapu meda page rayo mali repo pati mea ipu, yaa puluma lapo page mea ipu.
Abram-me mo yaenu rayo Gote piri mea ipua, lapolapolo loralapata pua rikirana pora masawa amupisa. Yalapo komea goa napi pa isa.
Gorabu yaa itayamame nolalo riya ipisimi pare, Abram-me ratu rubebe pisa.
Nare pabola popesa raburi, Abram nipu u adaa meda patisa. Gorabu nipu adaa riba medame rigitaniasa rabu pala omesa.
Gorabu Adaa Aa-me nipu para lalo: Neme go piare waru makuape, neme maralalide onaare ada medanini kimisu onaanurupa awalimi, goapua nimuri go alimide su ada onaana slav kogono pae onaa alimi. Go onaana kogonore mali 400 rupara radapi kogono pualimi.
Goa palimide su adarenuri neme page nimu keda waru katoa, wala orope nimu gima epalimi raburi, nimumi oyae adapu mea epalimi.
Go yapare nere lo kumana rupara awa omali.
Nena ruru onaare go su-para abi naepalimi. Akoloya Amor onaame waea pa palaeme. Nimuna waea waru palaina loare pane ratu rubalua. Go rabu nena rururi kaara maala popenaloa nimu wala epalimi.
Nare paboa riba saraburi, miru yawapalae repenagaa sosopene-para paa meda page pata paa rupa roriaa ipua mena paaki lapona rikirana popesa.
Goyapinare Gote-me Abram rapu agaa rogasa. Goapua lalo: Nena rururi go su kalalo, go ipa Isip pua mo ipa Yupritis rupara
abia go suri Keni onaa-para, Kenis onaa-para, Kadmon onaa-para,
Et onaa-para, Peris onaa-para, Repaa onaa-para,
Amori onaa-para, Kenan onaa-para, Gigasi onaa-para, Sebus onaa-para, gonu pimi suri ne gialo.
Abram-na ore Sera nogo-naaki na madiasa. Yapare nipuna kogono pae, Isip nogo Ega asimi.
Gore Sera-me Abram para lalo: Adaa Aa-me ni nogo-naaki na geadega na kogono nogo rapu patalipina. Nipu mada nina ruru madaa maopaina. Abram-me Sera-na sa agaa ratisa.
Abram-me nipu Kenan mali 10 awa ore Sera-me nipuna kogono pae Isip nogo Ega mua aani ore ma-aulainalo kasa.
Abram Ega rapu patisa, goa pua naaki pada pirisa. Nipu naaki pada pirisa makuawa nipuna surube onana rolo para napiri agaa napagisa.
Gore Sera-me Abram-para lalo: Go adalo kedare neme adape keda rialo. Nina kogono nogore nena kina sawade, goa pua abiare nipu naki pada pilo makuawa nina agaa na pagea. Adaa Aa-me ne-sana rikirana rumaina.
Abram-me lalo: Nena kogono nogore nena kina iya. Nena kone-para paliare pape, gore Sera-me Ega udipa pisa pulu nipu pogola pisa.
Adaa Aa-na Ensol-me Ega mo ipa repaa-para su kapune pare adesa. Go ipare mo Sur pora paginane popea.
Gore Ensol-me lalo: Ega, Serana kogono nogo, apara awa, wala apara polalo pi? Nina surube ona Sera pogola pulu.
Gore Adaa Aa-na Ensol-me nipu goa lakesa: Nena surube ona Sera piri wala pua, nipuna agaa pagape.
Ensol-me lalo: Nena rururi ma-adayalua, goa pua dipiape rupa page maralimi.
Adaa Aa-na Ensol-me wala lalo: Nere naki pada-pi pulu naki madiali. Nipuna biri Ismael lape, akoloya, Adaa Aa-me nena re-e pagade.
Nipuri kira mena raa yana rupa alia. Nipu onaa rayo rapu yada-kepealia rabu onaa rayome nipu yada-kepealimi, goa pua nipuna onaa rayo gimua agurapo alia.
Ega-me Adaa Aa go bi kasa: Akoloya ni Ade Gote. Nipumi lalo: Abiare ni adea Gote-re adalo.
Go ipa-na biri, Bia La Roi teme, abia page go ipare Kades para Bered lapona rikirana popea.
Ega-me Abram-na naki madiasa, goa pua Abram-me, Ega-me madiasa nakina biri Ismail sa.
Abram-na mali 86 patinaloa Ega-me naki madiasa.
Abram-na mali 99 patinaloa, Adaa Aa nipu piri ipua lalo: Ni Gote purina-re yapulu oroyalo nina rolo-para pirape. Goa pua epeanu pape.
Nina rogae agaa nerapu ora palua, goa pua nena onaa maadayalua.
Go rabu Abram nipu suna adaneawa kubuniasa, go rabu Gote-me nipu-para lalo:
Go rogatepa agaana papeare go lapatoda nere ruru adapuna aara pirali.
Nere abiare Abram pida wala nateme, nena biri abiare Abraham teme, akoloya nere abia onaa adapuna aara maapiralua.
Ne madare ini adapu etalia. Goa pua ruru adapu pitimi pare medalomare aa mudu pitimi.
Go rogatepa agaare oroyalo salia. Goa pua ne sana rikirana page, gome madu saliade nogo nakinuna rikirana page, nimina Gote pitua.
Go Kenan onaana su ne abia go kimisu ipua epaa ayere, neme nepara nena orope madusalide nogo naki walo diayawa, niri nimina Gote pitua.
Goa pua Gote-me Abraham-para lalo: Nere neme goapa toadare waru ratape nepara nena ruru orope epaliminu page, neme go rogatepa agaa waru pagoa ratalepape.
Nerapu agaa gupa rogato. Nena ruru orope epaliminu page, Nimi goa pipape. Aa naki rayona yogane puduri rugutapape.
Ora rayona yogane puduri rugutapape. Go robore sana roga i-agaana robo.
Naki rayore yapi 8 popenaloare, yogane puduri rugulatepape, orope maralalimide rayona page komea goa pipape. Pa ruru para kaboria epe onaana sinuna page kogono aanuna sinu page.
Nena adare-para madininu page kaboria epenuna page go rayona yogane puduri ora rugulatepape. Go robomere nina, nimi rapu rogae agaare (pa sama lama palia).
Yogane na ruguteade aanakinuri nina ruruda diaga ratu rubape, gore nina rogae agaa ruguta.
Gote-me Abram para wala lalo: Nena ore Saraina, bi rado ma-ato, abiare nipuna biri Sarah lape.
Nipu neme maepealua, goa pua nena naki mada madialia. Nipu neme maepealua pulu nipu mada ruru adapu epalimi. Aa mudunu page nipu mada opalimi.
Go rabu Abram-me kubuniawa, Gote adaa bi kasa, nipume giri-loa kone gupa isa. Gorupa mali 100 pope yomagae-na naki madiata pae? Sarah page mali 90 yadega naki mada madialia pae?
Gore Abram-me Gote para lalo: Nena lae-are Ismael mada na palipae?
Go rabu Gote-me lalo: E, yapare, nena ore Sarah-me nena naki mada madialia, goa paliaga, nipuna biri Aisak lape. Nina rogae agare nipurapu palua, go rogalipade aagare orope maralaliade ruru rapu page pa sama lama palia.
Nena si Ismail-para page, nena laedea pagawade. Nipu page neme epea palua. Nipu nogo-naki page adapu katoa, neme ne madare ruru adapu page maralaina toa. Nimu aamudu 12 page piralimi, goa pua neme nipuna rururi puri waru pabenatoa.
Go yapare nina rogae aagare Aisak rapu rogalua, mo mali medana Saraha-me madialiade naki rapu.
Gote-me Abraham rapu aaga lo kirituare nipu pisa.
Ora go yapinare Abraham-me nipuna si Ismael para, nipuna adarupara madini naki rayo para moneme kaboria epe-naki rayo page nipuna adarepara asimi aanaki rayona yogaene puduri rugulaisa. Gote-me lakisade rupa.
Abraham nipuri mali 99 patina loa, yogane pudu rugusa raburi,
si Ismael-re mali 13 patina loa.
Abraham para si Ismael lapore meda rabu go yapina yogane pudu rugusipi.
Go raburi Abraham-na su-ada para asimi aa naki rayopara pa su medapara kaboria ipisa aa nakinuna page rayo nipu rapu yogane rugusimi.
Adaa Aa Abraham piri wala ipisa, mo Mamre-na adaa repena puti regepea narepame riripu waru pisa pulu Abraham nipuna sele ada poragape para pirisa.
Abraham-me adasaisa pare aa repo pa go pare reka aina adisa. Nipumi nimu adoare sele ada gimoa aloma madari pua alu pua kubunaisa.
Nipumi lalo: Naa adaa aanu, epea pamega, nimi nina ada nagimoa pulupape. Ni nimina kogono aa.
Ipa aba mea gula epono, goa puare nimina age aba radepeano go ada repena repara kitu piramina.
Neme nimina nape eta meata pono, goa puare puri mua nimina polalo pame nane palimina. Nimi naa adanane epamenada rana piaga nimina eta managolano. Nimumi lalo: Mada, nena laeare paina.
Gore aipapulu Abraham nipu Sarah piri sele adapara pisa. Nipumi goa-pua sa: Aipapulu plawa 20 kg ora epede waru adaapu managola, pereke-yoa bret waria ira.
Wala aipapulu nipuna gawa menanu aisimi para aloma pisa, goa pua epe pena apa ae yandapu mena meda pua mua nipuna kogono aa epa kaloa aipapulu managolatepa sa.
Mo gawa mena aba risa raburi gawana midi para gawana adu ipame warini eta-para mo gawana adu ipa medaloma mea ipisa. Goa pua mo kimisu aa repo epa kasa. Go eta nala pirinare, nipu repena repara suruba adoaisa.
Nimumi lalo: Nena ore Sarah akepa? No sele adapara no piada-sa.
Go rabu mo aa medame lalo: Ora go-dina ne piri para wala malina epalua, nena ore Sarah-me naki meda madu saba piralia. Gore Sarah-re nimuna masanane sele ada poragape para pirua pagaba pirisa.
Abraham para Sarah lapore onagae yomagae lapo pirina. Sarah nogo-naki page madiape ai nai rabu.
Sarah-me nipuna agurapo pirua giri loa, goa kone isa. Niri aba ora onagaesi yade, nina adaa aa page ora yomagaesi yande pare ni mada go padane para patape rana salia pae?
Go rabu Adaa Aa-me Abraham-para lalo: Neme lalo agaanare Sarah-me giri akolo tapae: Niri onagae yadega neme naki meda madialua yapae?
Yae meda Gote-me papeare mada napaliaya? Wala malina apo epalua lawade raburi Sarah-me naki mada madu saba-piralia.
Sarah palame omisa pulu yagaa loa: Giri nalawadesa. Nipume lalo: Giri laedega yagaa nalapesa.
Mo aa repo polalo rekesimi rabure nimumi Sodom adaniasimi. Goa pua Abraham-me nimu pulumi rupa adoa rapatalo nimu rapu puamama pisa.
Go rabu Adaa Aa-me lalo: Neme pulalo pi-are Abraham-re kudiri palua pae?
Abraham-me maralaliade rururi adayoa puri komeada pabalimi, goa pua nipu madare go suada rayo epeama palia.
Neme nipu aba mada-misu pulu nipumi nipuna nogonaki-para nipuna adare para aeme onaa rayo mana tea. Neme katoa agaa ratinaloa nimumi epea pua ni epe kone gina. Goa pua Adaa Aa-me Abraham-me maralaliade rurunu page palua siade aonuri ora palia.
Gore Adaa Aa-me lalo: Sodom Gomora supara pimi onaame peme wae-yaenuna, agaa ora adapu epeada.
Ni gopara pulu, nimuna peme waea adola, goa pua ora yapalo nabipa adaluame.
Gore aa lapo Abraham gimoa Sodom adarena poranini pisipi. Adaa Aa-re Abraham aisa pare pa aisa.
Go rabu Abraham nipu Adaa Aa regepea ipua lalo: Neme epe onaa para wae onaa rayo taliya?
Go adare para epe onaa 50 pitimire, neme nimu page wae onaa rapu pa taliya? Neme mogo epe onaa 50 niminawa go adare pa inateya?
Nemere epe onaa-re, wae onaa tala-arare nataliya? Mo wae onaa me pemea madaa, epe onaa rada nanena, neme goa napaina. Nere onaa rayo rumae aa yade pulu; epea ora paina.
Adaa Aa-me lalo: Epe onaa 50 piralimi-dare gore pana bina natalua.
Gore Abraham-me nipu wala lorapisa: Adaa Aa, neme wala rana lapopa agaa mealo. Niri taaga para do lapo rupa yade.
Goa peaga 45 epe onaa piralimiri mo 50 ma-epapena supu diayaliare pa taliya? Neme 45 adaluare, gore nataluasa.
Rana repopa wala Adaa Aa para goa sa: Gore 40 ama yaliare, gopage pa taliya? Adaa Aa-me lalo: 40 piralimi-dare gimalua.
Abraham-me lalo: Adaa Aa neme ratu na yawape, wala agaa meano, gore 30 yaliare, ake paliya? Adaa Aa-me lalo: Neme yada na palua 30 piralimi da page.
Abram-me lalo: Ratu na yawape neme ne wala apo agaa mealoga. Pa 20 komea yalia-dare ake paliya? Nipumi lalo: 20 komea piralimi page natalua.
Abraham-me wala lalo: Adaa Aa neme ni ratu na yawape, pare neme ne rana-komea wala agaa mealo. Gore pa 10 ama yaliare ake paliya? Nipumi gorupa abusa: Ora 10 ama yalia page na talua.
Gore Adaa Aa-me Abraham rapu agaa lo kirituare nipu pisa, go rabu Abraham nipu page ada pisa.
Aebore mo Ensol lapo Sodom pua opapaisipi. Gore Lot-re adarena kerepo para pirisaya. Nipumi nimu adoare, rekataboa nimu madata pisa, goa pua iniaga su kaloa ma kubunaisa.
Na adaa aa lapo, nipumi lalo: Nipina kogono aana adapara kitumu, age radepe, patalipina. Goa pua ribarekore nipina palipina. Dia nipumi lalo: Mo onaa kiritaemede amaa patalipa.
Lot-me ora dia loa puri pabisa pulu nipuna adapara pisimi. Nipumi eta managolaisa, bret page ist nai irua nisimi.
Nimu u pena patulalo pala pirinare Sodom adare para asimi aa rayo, oge adaa rayome ada epa kutapu sabasimi.
Nimumi Lot yasimi: Go riba epapede aa lapore ake pape? Amaa nia piri mea ipu, niame nipu pake namona.
Lot nimu adolalo amaa pulawa poragape waru moganiasa.
Goa pua lalo: Dia na adami aanu go wae-yaere na palimina.
Adalepa, niri nogo lapo, aa rapu abi napati madu ide. Nipu amaa mea epono goa pua nimina rana ratalimina. Go aa lapore yae meda na palimina. Nina ada epape pulu neme nipu ora rabamealua.
Nimumi talo: Pane popa a. Goa pua nimumi lalo: Apo aare pa epa ae aa yade, goa pua abiare nipumi nia surubaluame pana. Aa lapo mada pulaa-pamaare, ne madaa ora waea waru pumuna. Nimumi Lot pane orolo paisimi, goa pua pora gape atubitua rupara odobatalo pisimi.
No rupara pirisipide aa lapome Lot yolorua pora-gape agolaeme garula sasipi.
Goa pua nipume mo pora-gape para asimide aanu, oge adaa lapo ratana ini ma-rubu paama pisipi. Goa pisa pulu nimumi pora gape adape rupa marisimi.
Mo aa lapome Lot-para lalo: Go para nena onaare meda aeme? Nena siwanenu page, gonuna siwanenu page, o pa nena onaanu page go ada kagure-para meda aeme? Aipapulu pua lamu-mua, pane pogola pulupa.
Ake peada ya, go su adare apo pabo tu rubalepada. Go adare-para aeme onaame peme waeare ora adata pulu, Adaa Aa-me go adare pabotu rubaponalo sa mea reparia.
Go rabu Lote-me wane lapo mulalo pi akua lapo laketa pisa. Nipumi pua lalo: Go su aipapulu gimoa pane pogola baini sa, Adaa Aa-me go ada kagure pabo rubolalo pia! Gore akua lapome pa makirata kone isipi.
Riba rekore mo Ensol lapome, Lot aipapulu ma rekaisipi. Nipumi goa sipi: Aipapu tapa! Go aeme nena ore para wane lapo page. Gore go ada kagure talawa nimi talia.
Lot-me aipapu na sa raburi, mo Ensol lapome kimina misipi, ore wane lapona ki mina mua aipapulu adarena amanane mea pisipi, gore Adaa Aa-me nimu odome omesa.
Nimu ama mea ipuare, mo aa medame goa sa: Pogola pulupa! Goa puare wala napereketua adalepape. Mo paune pare palimi rabu page kitu na piralepape! Nimi omalimiga so rudu rudu pogola pulupa.
Naa Adaa Aa-laapo, sogo rudu rudure ora dia.
Niri aba raba meape-de, go page ni epe kone sua raba meapede pulu, rana sogo rudu rudure pope-ai nasala, pena pulano apo yaeme ni mealia pulu, ni omalua.
Mogo ayaa oge adare parare mada palua. Ni pogola go para pono, gore ora oge adaresiya? Goa palua rabu ni mada epealia.
Nipumi lalo: Madaga apo lae adarere natalipa.
Goa peaga mogo para aipapulu pogola pulupa, nimi go para abi nape alimina yada napalua. Goane go adarena biri Soa teme.
Lot Soa opapaisa raburi nare aba raa ipisa.
Go raburi Adaa Aa-me yapara pirumea repena sula yai rupa Sodom Gomora lapona mea repaisa.
Nipumi go awaro paunena asa su ada luabu rayo iru rubisa, go adare para asimi onaa rayo para emaapu page iru rubisa.
Lot-na ore pereketua adamonesa rabu nipu aipaa ana ausa.
Wala yapipure Abraham aba ribareko rekataboa mode pare pisa, aba Adaa Aa rapu agaa sade pare.
Nipumi Sodom Gomora lapo adaneasa pare apode awaro paune su rayo page miru kapukapu ropatisada adisa, go mirure adaa repena ropati rupana adisa.
Gote-me mo ada kagure iru rubala-awa nipumi Abraham-me sa agaa niminasa. Goa pua nipumi Lot pane mupawa nipu ae adare luabu iru rubisa.
Lot-para nipuna wane lapo Soa gimua so pore-para pua asimi. Nipu Soa ape pala omisa pulu, nipuna wane lapo rapu ana apeda meda para asimi.
Yapi medame, mupa nogome nipuna aki para lalo: Sana aapare yomagaesi, goa pua saa rumape aa page meda dia. Gore ona rumapeare abade su rayona pia yapulu.
Goa pea pulu sana aapare ipa waini nena lapana, goa pua sa nipu rapu patapana, goa pua niana ruru same aapa-rapu maralapana.
Go ribare nipuna aapa ipa waini nenasipi, goa pua mupa nogo araa rapu pua patisa. Nipuna wane nipu rapu epa patua reka pisare namakuasa.
Wala yapi medame mupa nogome orope nogo para lalo: Ni abala ribare apa rapu patawade. Abia ribare nipu ipa waini wala nena lapana, goa pua ne aaparapu patalipina, goa puare niana ruru, sana aaparapu wala maralapana.
Go ribare nipuna araa ipa waini wala nena loa wane orope nogo araa rapu pua patisa. Nipuna wane orope nogo epa patua reka pisa page namakuasa.
Lote-na wane laporata aara rapu awa naki pada pirisipi.
Mo mupa nogome naki madua nipuna bire Moab sa. Nipuri abia Moab ruru-na ara pia.
Wala orope nogome page naki madisa, goa pua Ben-Ammi lo bi maaisa. Nipu page Amonite ruru-na aara pia.
Abraham-me Mamre su gimoa Negep supara pisa. Nipu Kedes para Sar lapona rikirana pua asa, goa pua nipu Gera ogesi pua awa.
Ore Sarah-re, nina bani yade sa. Gera-na aa mudu Abimalek-me Sarah pua meatepa loa nipu misa.
Rana meda riba Abimalek piri Gote epana ipumea nipu para lalo: Nere omali. Gore apo meaede onare aa aba pe ona yade.
Abimalek nipu mo ona piripara abi na pisa, goa pua nipumi lalo: Adaa Aa waea napi onaare pa taliya?
Nipuna bipa ni laagiade: Sarah-re nina bani lade. Oname page nina bani lade. Neme waea kone nasawa, epea pikone sawa.
Gore Gote-me wala epana ipua goa sa: E, gore pa epea pi kone saede, pare ne mo onarapu naa pataedere, ni repara waea palilo neme ma-parude. Goane mo ona naa oraina-laawade.
Abiare apo ona nipuna ani wala kalape, gore nipuri nina agaa lae aa yade, goa pua nipumi nena beten lalia, goa palia rabu ne epe rupa ali. Go yapare nipu na katedare, ora ria-lalo ne page nena onaa page rayo omalimi.
Wala yapipu aba ribarekore Abimalek-me nipuna kogono aanu yasa, mo nipuna adisade yae luabu lakelo kiritisa raburi, nimumi pala waru omisimi.
Go rabu Abimalek-me Abraham-para ipuloa lalo: Nemere niare akepae pae? Neme neparare waea meda napawade, gore neme kedare nipara naa onanu piri apo mea epaena? Neme nipara paenare napapea paena.
Abimalek-me Abraham agaamisa: Goare nemere akena rena pae?
Abraham-me lalo: Nina bipa goa lawa, Go adare para Gote pala na-omeme ada kone sawa. Onaame nina ore nimu mulalo niri talimi kone sawa.
Ora riare nipuri nina bani page yade, sana-aapare komea yapare amare rado rado; goyapare nipuri abiare nina ore yade.
Go raburi Gote-me nena aapana su anda gimapu saraburi, neme nipu-para goa su: Nena lo-pu robare ni gupa giape, palipade suluabu parare, niri na bani yade lape.
Go rabu Abimalek-me sipisipi para gawa para kogono aa onanu page Abraham epa kasia, goa pua nipuna ore Sarah page wala nipuna kasa.
Abimalek-me lalo: Na suri ogepu apo naiyada, nena rana paliapara ape.
Sarah parare goa sa: Nena baniri neme mone ini (tausen) kina go kalaloda. Go piamere nepara nena rurunu rapuri agaa meda na salia lalo, nerapuri agaa ora ogesida page ora na salia.
Gote-me Abimalek-na rurupara ona nogo rayore nogo naki na madinasa. Akoloya, Abimalek-me Abraham-na ore Sarah nipu misada. Gore Abraham-me Gote repara beten paisa. Go rabu Gote-me Abimalek-maepeasa, ore para nipuna kogono nogonu page, goa pua nimumi nogo naki wala madisimi.
<range>
Abiare Adaa Aa-na rana Sarah-repara nipuna sarupa wala pisa, ora mo Adaa Aa nipuna palua sia rupa ora goa pisa.
Sarah-me naki pada pirua Abraham-na naki yomagae dina madiaisa, gore ora mo Gote-me madiali sa dina madisa.
Abraham-me nipuna Sarah-me madiaisa nakina biri Aisak lo bi ma asa.
Aisak nipu yapidi (8) popisa raburi Abraham-me yogane mo Gote-me pipape sarupa ruguta pisa.
Abraham nipu mali 100 popenaloa nipuna si Aisak madisa.
Sarah-me lalo: Gote-me ni giri malasa, go rabu onaa rayome page go rema pagoa giri nirapu teme.
Nipumi wala lalo: Apimi Abraham-na naki madiawa adu katea sa pae? Goyapare nipuna naki yomagae rana apo madiarude.
Aisak adayoa agina adu adawasa, go rabu adu adawaisa yapinare Abraham-me adaa eta meda iraisa.
Goyapare Sarah-me adisapare Ega mo Isip oname Abraham-na madiasa nakimi giri giri lala pirisa,
go rabu Sarah-me Abraham para lalo: Apo ona-re pakogono ona yadega si-rapu pane raturuba, go kogono onana si-mi naa oyae rayore na si Aisak rapu mada na rumalipiga.
Go agaa-mere Abraham lokeda waru risa, gore nipuna si mada kone mapirasa pulu.
Yapare Gote-me nipupara lalo: Neme go naki para apo slav kogono ona lapopara lo-keda ogepu rubape. Goa peaga Sarah-me tea pagape. Apo ma ralali sude rururi gore Aisak mada para sude.
Neme mo kogono onana si madare ruru adapu warialua, akoloya nena si yada.
Wala riba-rekore Abraham-me eta-para ipa lapo noria pua Ega na pasana mariasa. Goa pua naki agiaya rapasa. Nipu aagiaya pua Besiba su kapune-pare opopawa pua pamudipiasipi.
No madisipi ipa diasa-raburi, mo naki repena-re meda-para ma-pirasa.
Goa pua ogeda mo-pare nenepu pua pirisa, mo naki omaala adape yada, gimoa pua re lala pirisa.
Gote-me mo nakina re lalaina pagesa. Gote-na Ensol-me yaa-para awa Ega yasaa: Ega, akepeada lae? Neme pala naomape, Gote-me nena sina re pagade.
Nena naaki pua mua kimi mea ipu. Gore ne madare neme onaa adaapu maralama pena toa.
Gorabu Gote-me agina ini rupaina sa rabu nipumi ipa naaku meda adesa. Gore nipumi mo ipa meme mena yogane pe-para norua naki-mi nenalo pua kasa.
Gote nipu go naki-rapu pirisa-pulu adayabisa. Nipu mo su kapuni-pare aware yaa-yapa piapena makuae aa aisa.
Nipu mo Paran-su kapune pare aisa raburi, nipuna aagi-mi Isip ona meda yoto kasa.
Go yapinare Abimelek-para, yadapi aanuna Surube aa Pikol lapome Abraham-para lalo: Gote-re nena oyae meda pulalope-para ne rapu pia.
Abiare ni Gote-na ini-agaana goa napalualo lapawa ni-na makirape, o nina nogo-nakinu page, o gonumi madialimide page. Neme ne epea pawadeane epaa-aye adare page, epea paluaga neme ni ora epea pape.
Abraham-me lalo: Neme ora palua-sa.
Gore Abraham-me nipuna ipa-naaku Abimelek-na Kogono aame misa rabu Abimelek rapu agaa lalapasipi.
Gore Abimelek-me lalo: Goa panare apimi panapalo marea-sa. Ni aba nalagiaede pare, wala abia go pogolasatoda.
Gore Abraham-me mena sipisipi-para, mena gawa-para, meapua Abimelek pua kasa rabu, nipu lapo upasipi
Abraham-me sipisipi mena wai 7 kuta meda-para meamaisa.
Go rabu Abimelek-me Abraham gupa agaa-misa: Apo mena sipisipi 7 kuta rado para ainalaere, akolo-pi?
Nipumi lalo: Go mena sipisipi neme meainalo pi, goa pali rabu mo ipa-naku neme awesade kone ina.
Goa-peada go suri Besiba teme, akoloya go-pare nipu lapona agaa aba rogaeisipi.
Abimelek-para yadapi aanuna aa mudu Pikol lapo nipu Wala Pilistia-nuna Su-para pisipi.
Abraham-me Tamariks repena-wai Besiba poaisa. Go pare-re nipumi Adaa Aa-na bi loa lotu Sa, go Gote-re oroyalo kagaa pia-loa.
Goa pua Abraham mo Pilistia aanuna Su-para adalupu pa awaisa.
Yapi medaloma popena loa, Gote-me Abraham kotisa. Gote-me nipu-para lalo: Abraham! Abraham-me lalo: Ni go ayoda.
Go rabu Gote-me lalo: Nena si, nena si komea, Aisak, neme kone mapiranedere mo Moria su-para pulupa. Neme watoade pore medana iru madiayae miru pua irape.
Ribarekore Abraham rekataboa nipuna donki mena managolaisa. Nipumi Aisak-para, nipuna kogono aalaapo lamuripinisa. Nipumi iru madia yape miru irape repena mada rekepuare, nipu Gote-me pope sade-para pisa.
Repopa yapinare Abraham-me, mo polalo pisade su pua ada monesa.
Nipuna kogono aalaapo-para lalo: Donki mena-rapu ado atepape, naki sare mogo pare popona. Gote adaa-bi pua kaloa wala epopona.
Abraham-me iru madia yae miru irape repena kapuri, si Aisak mariawa, repena ega-para, rai napi lapore nipuna ki-para ripinisa. Goa pua nipu komeapara puamama pisipi.
Aisak-me araa Abraham-para lalo: Apa? Abraham-me lalo: Na si akeya? Aisak-me lalo: Mo repena ega-para repena kapu lapore go ripinitipa ga, mo iru madiayae miru irape mena sipisipi ra?
Abraham-me lalo: Naa si, apo iru madiayape miru irape mena sipisipiri, Gote-me managolalia. Goa pua nipu padane-para pisipi.
Gote-me lakesade-para ipisipi raburi, Abraham-me ana reke meda go-para waria, repena kapu ana rekena isa. Goa puare sina ki alapo rogawa, so ana rekena musawa repena kapu mada saniasa isa.
Goa pua, nipuna ki ridulawa, rai napi mua si awolalo pisa.
Go rabu Adaa Aa-na Ensol-me soyapara awa yasa: Abraham! Abraham! Nipumi lalo: Go ayoda.
Apo naki mada ki napirape. Nipu mada yae meda napape, abiare makuato, ni Gote mada kone mapirarina, gore nena si padane yade kone nasaede. Ni pagulalo paede.
Abraham-me adasaisa pare sipisipi mena meda repena pala ubura ipara ima mapalaga tabaisa. Nipumi mo sipisipi pua mua si polo-para iru madiayae miru mea irisa.
Go rabu Abraham-me go suri: Adaa Aa-me Managolae sa. Gore abia page go pore-re Adaa Aa-me managola-walialo gupa pateme.
Adaa Aa-na Ensel-me soyapara awaa rana laapopa Abraham yaloa lalo:
Adaa Aa-me lalara nerapu agaa rogato, akepeadaya gore neme goa padeane, nena si ora naa loma naki padane pida nalade.
Neme ne ora maepeawa, nena maralalide rururi, uba kedonu yaapara ayade rupa page, ipa mu rupa page maralalua. Go maralalide rurumiri iyanu pabo-tu rubua, nimuna adarenu page nimu minabalimi.
Nena maralalide onaa madare, go su rayona onaa rayo maepealua. Gore neme na agaa pagaede pulu.
Abraham nipu wala nipuna kogono aa laapo asipi pare wala ipua Besiba nimuna padane para pisimi. Goa pua Abraham Besiba pua asa.


































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Agaa Pagoa rumaae aanumi Israel su surubisimi raburi reae ada meda pabisa. Betlem aa medare nipu Juda aa-ga pa ogepu yapina Moap supara aata pisa. Go aa-re nipuna ore-para si lapo page pisimi.
Go aana biri Elimalek pare orena biri Naomi yade. Si lapona biri Malon-para Kilion lapo. Pirisimi nimuri Eprata ruru gore Juda ruruna Betlem supara aawoa pisimi. Nimu Moap aata pisimi.
Go yapare Elimalek omesa raburi Naomi nipu si lapo raapu pirisa.
Orope naaki lapome Moap ona lapo misipi. Go ona lapona biri Opa-para Rut lapo pirisipi.
Gore Malon-para Kilion lapo page omesipi. Abiare Naomina aani-para si lapo page omesipi-pulu agurapo aasa.
Naomi-mi remaa gupa pagesa: Adaa Aa-me nape eta nipuna onaa kaloa epe raana kalalo pagesa. Go rabu nipuna aaya lapo raapu Moap su gima polalo managolasimi.
MoJudanuna su-para Naomi-para aaya lapo page pisimi pare pora pa pulawa.
Naomi-mi nipu goa lakesa: Nipi wala nipina ada pua nipina ama lapo raapu pua aatepape. Nipimi ni page na si lapo aba omapede page epea pisipide-pulu Adaa Aa-me page nipi epea mada palia.
Adaa Aa-me nipi rabamealia rabu nipi page aa pua epe-rupa mada aalipi. Naomi mi ona lapo para patalepape sa rabu nipumi re ora waru sipi
pare nipumi gipia loa nena onaana ada baina sipi.
Yapare Naomi-mi lalo: Diaga nipina ada palipina sa. Akepeada nipimi ni ratamea epalipiya? Dia.
Niri onagae yade. Ni aa meda wala mada na-palua. Nipina adaa wala palipina. Go page neme abia go ribaa aa meda pua naaki madialua rabu
nipimi surubaawa go aa mada napalipi. Gore nasurubalipi nipi pa aanu meda palipina. Adaa Aa-me ni waea pisa-pulu, nipi page odo waru pia.
Rut Opa lapo upia re wala sipi. Opa-me Naomi patape loa pisa pare Rut-ri Naomi raapu pa aisa.
Go rabu Naomi-mi Rut goa lakesa: Ada, nena akini nipuna onaanuna ada pua nimuna makirae gote-nuya wala mo pulada. Ne page wala pulupa.
Gore Rut-me agaa gupa abusa: Ni ne minarepaawa ora pulo rutu natape. Ne palide suparare ni page pamuapana. Ne aali-parare ni page aawapana. Nena onaare nina onaa page yalia. Nena Gote-re nina Gote page yalia.
Ne omali-parare ni page omaluada rogaalimi. Yae medame saa naruguna lapana. Neraapu go rogaato agaada mabebola taluadare Adaa Aa-me ni mabebola talia. Omape yaeme ne saa rugulala paina.
Rut nipu Naomi raapu polalo agu rapesa-pulu nipu agaa wala meda nasa.
Goa pua nipu lapo Betlem pua pelapasipi. Naomi nipu Betlem pua opopasipi rabu go ada repara piri onaa reko oyasimi. Go rabu go ada piri ona medame goa sa: Gore Naomi ya?
Go rabu nipumi nimu goa lakesa: Nimimi nipara Naomi bi wala natapape. Ni-para bi Mara tapape. Akoloya? Gote puri rayona reme ni waea pisada lalo. Goa peaga ni kone wae mi ona-yapulu niparare Mara-ya tapape.
Ni go supara pa aaru raburi oyae adaapu waru oraaru pare Ada Aame ni wala mea epaa raburi oyae meda wala nasaayo. Ni kedaa ma-adasa rabu ni radaa ne.
Go remaare Naomi Moap su gimoa epena remaa yade. Rut Moap ona raapu nipuna ayaa ona pua nipu Betlem opopasipi. Gore rais bali ini napeyoa kereape yapi dina ipisipi.
Boas-re Elimalek-na ruru-para ada aa pirisa. Nipuri Naomi-na abana aanina ruru aa.
Yapi medame Rut-mi Naomi-para goa sa: Niri maapu-para aanumi ponatu amu peme rais balina ini kereta pulu. Kogono aanumida mada temedare gore nimu raapu aawa rais madiaa palua.
Gore Rut maapu-para mo kogono aanu ratamea pua rais bali-na ini pua makiroatasa. Go maapuri Elimelek-na ame Boas-na maapu kone na-isa. Boas-me Rut epea pisa.
Boas-me Betlem su gimoa nipuna kogono aanu piri epa pelapaawa go-rupa epe naarepa sa. Adaa Aa nimi raapu pirina sa. Gore nimumi nipuna agaa gorupa abusimi: Adaa Aa-me ne maepeaina.
Go rabu Boas-me surube aa gupa agaa misa: Go ona inumakua-re ane ruru nogo ya?
Surube aame go-rupa abusa: Naomi raapu epape ya pare pa ruru nogo meda yade. Nipu Mopa gimoa epape-ya.
Nipumi ni agaamea apo aanu raapu pamua bali ini kiratano la. Nipu ora ribaa reko ripima kogono pua kitu ogesi go epa mealada.
Go rabu Boas-me Rut gupa lakesa: Go nogo, naa agaa paga. Ne wala maapu meda-para napope. Dia pa go maapuna balina ini keraina. Nena kogono ona-repa raapu kogono paina.
Kogono pimi-rupa adoa nimu raapu aape. Nina kogono aanu aba lakeloa ne waru surubalepapelo lakelawa. Ipa nala paliare apo no imiga nola pope.
Rut-me rumu pegepua suna kubuniaawa Boas-para goa lakesa: Niri pa ada meda ona yadega akepeada neme ni adoa epea pi?
Boas-me agaa gupa abusa: Nena aani omenaloa nena aaya-para paeyade-a rayo aba pagawa. Ni makuaayo. Nena ama aapanu-para nena adare page gimaeyade. Goa pua nina onaanu raapu epa aaye.
Ne Gote piri epaena Israel-na Adaa Aa nipumi ne surubenalo. Gore nipumi nena pae epe aunu aba ada-pulu ne epe yoto gina.
Gore Rut-me Boas-na agaa gupa abusa: Neme ni ora epea waru pi. Niri nena epe kogono onanu nonapida dia pare neme ni epe agaa kuma pi lage rabu go-me nina pu robaa ne piri mea epea.
Eta nape raburi Boas-me Rut wala goa lakesa: Ne go-pare ipua bret meda epa mua wain-para pataawa naa. Go rabu Rut nipu kogono ona meda raapu pirisa. Go rabu Boas-me repena egaana irini bali medaloma kasa. Mea nisa rabu Rut-na robaa rubisada medaloma pa isa.
Rut-me eta no kiritua balina ini medaloma kirata isa. Go rabu Boas-me nipuna kogono aanupara goa sa: Nimi apo radala pira ia balina iniri Rut-me mea kirata ina tapape. Nimimi nipu ratu nayawalepape.
Nimimi balina rogorogo medaloma ma lopatepape. Nipumi mea kirataina nimimi nipu naratu rubalepape.
Rut-me rais balina ini amaa kirita amu pala pirina naare pabola popesa. Makiraata suare ini rada rada malaawa napere kirita isa. Nape iniri ten kilo popesa.
Rut-me adare-para mea pua aaya pua wasa. Naare-palu nisade etana purapina page aaya pua kasa.
Go rabu Naomi-mi Rut gupa agaa misa: Abiare balire aapara meae? Nere kogono akepiane aana maapu-para pae? Ne adoa kone saana aare Adaa Aa-me nipu epea pina. Go rabu Rut-me agaa gupa abusa: Abiare ni Boas-ne aa-na maapu kogono pawa sa.
Gore Naomi-mi lalo: Adaa Aa-me go aa ora ma-epeaina sa Adaa Aa nipuna palua ne-are aba omeme onaa page pa pimi onaa mada page ora pea: Naomi-mi wala goa sa: Go aare niana yapi mada ora niana ruru yade.
Gore Rut-me goa sa: Boas-me nipara wala goa la. Nere nipuna kogono onanu raapu kogono pua bali kirata sape kogono dia yalia rabu pua gimaina la.
Naomi-mi lalo: Ora lae Aaya. Gore neme aa medana maapu-para kogono pali raburi go aa-na kogono aa-numi ne wae-anu palimi. Goa peaga Boas-na kogono onanu raapu kogono paina.
Rut-me Boas-na kogono onanu raapu kogono paama pua bali-para wit lapo po kiritisa. Goa pua Rut nipu aaya raapu pa aasa.
Naomi-mi Rut gupa lakesa: Aaya pagae. Neme ne surubape aa meda asapano pae? Ne suruboa waru ado aata pea-rupa.
Abiare paga go aa Boas nipuna kogono onanu raapu kogono paayadere ora nina yapi ria yade. Abia go ribaare rais balina yo kininu waritimi-para kogono palia.
Gore ne pua wel sada-nupara epe maninanu maraaawa nena yogane ipaa pua radepeape. Goa pua nipuna kogono palia-para pope. Gore nipuna ini aga-nare napope. Dia pare nipu eta ipanu aba no kiritina-lape.
Nipu u patula paliare pua patala-para waru adape. Pua nipuna aa-nane blaket pua musaawa age regepea pua patape. Orope neme goa papelo lagialia.
Rut-me agaa gupa abusa: Epeta. Neme nena agaa rayo ratalua.
Gore Rut-me Naomi-mi mo sade-rupa balina ini yo ada warini-para rekoa pisa.
Boas-me eta ipanu mada noare nipuna lo robaa epesa. Nipu u patala pisa-pulu rais-bali ubura i regepea pua patisa. Gore Rut pawa pua blaket pua musaawa Boas-na age regepea pua patisa.
Riba Boas nipu pereke tisa pare ona meda nipuna age regepea go epaa patisa rabu nipu pogolasaasa.
Go rabu nere api-ya palo agaa misa. Rut-me lalo: Ni Rut nena kogono ona meda yade. Nere Elimelek-na yapiga neme ni raba mua surubape.
Boas-me pagoa Rut-para agaa go-rupa abusa: Na wane Adaa Aa-me ne ora epea pina. Abia neme go piare nena aaya-para paeyade epea rayo page rabuaniate. Ogegeaa-re adapu aeme pare medalomare oyae imi medalomare na imi. Go yapare neme goanu meda palua kone nasaena.
Abiare naa wane pala naomape. Neme nena teare rayo palua. Ora lae. Niri nena aanina yapi medaa yapulu ne surubape kogono palua. Onaa rayome nere epe ona yana kone salimi.
E abiare ora lae. Niri nena aanina yapi meda yapulu neme ne mada surubalua. Go yapare aba ririnane aya aame go kogono rayo palia.
Abiare ne go-pare aape. Ekeraa yapipuri go aa-na kone adola palua. Ne surubalua teadare mada pare dia teare gore neme ne surubalua. Neme ora lalo Adaa Aa-me makuaaya. Abiare wala abi pata.
Gore Boas-me wala goa sa: Onanumi ne go-para epaenalo namakuaaena. Gore Rut wala Boas-na age rolopara wala patisa. Gore yapi abi naneaina pisa-pulu oname na-adesimi.
Wala Boas-me Rut-para lalo: Laplap meda mea ipua suaama epaa rabola sa. Rut-me goa pisa rabu Boas-me bali medaloma koyaasa. Bali-na kedare 20 kilo popisa. Boas-me minasaawa ma-riasa rabu Rut-me ria pisa. Boas nipu wala adare-para pisa.
Rut ada pua opapasa rabu aayame lalo: Aaya apore ora neya? Go rabu Rut-me Boas-me goa palo rayo lakesa.
Rut-me lalo: Boas-me lalaara nena aaya piri pa napainalo bali medaloma rumaawa mea gia.
Gore Naomi-mi lalo: Aaya ogeda pa adoa. Apo aare pa napiralia. Diaagaa pamu maredepo yalaara pia. Paliare saa na-adepa.
Oropere Boas adare-na poragape-nane onaa kiritae-pare pua pirisa. Mo aba lade aa Elimelek-na medapara pati repera ipasa. Boas-me adami Aa ya loa go pare ipua epa pira. Nin go pare pua pirisa.
Boas-me aa mudunu (10) mua gupa lakesa: Nimi epa piralepa. Gore nimu epa pirisimi.
Nipumi nipuna yapi medagupa lakesa: Naomi-ri Moap gimoa wala epade pare sana yapi Elimalek-na sudere medame kabenalo rapata.
Goa lagialua-me lawade. Neme kabali-dare gore go aa mudunu-para pa aanu medaloma go epa pimi-nuna ini agaana kabaina. Nere ora aba repara yapi yade pulu neme kabainalo lawade. Nakabaliri gore ni lagi. Gore mo aame lalo: Kabalua sa.
Boas lakesa apo Naomi-para Rut lapona su kabalidare apo Moap ona Rut page meape nena ore pirina. Goa pua go suri mo omesade aana ruru repara ina.
Mo aa nipumi lalo: Gore apo yaere na yapare naa naakinu raapu page pa naki meda raapu nina yaenu pa narumalua. Ni apo su na kabalua pare goa peaga abiare nena iya.
(Abare Israel ruruna oyae meda kabapenare go page oyae ropo ropo papenare gore goa pala pisimi. Aa medame nipuna age ada koyo rua meda kalala pisimi. Israel onaame agaa rogaa penare goa pala pisimi.)
Go rabu mode aame Boas gupa lakesa: Go suri nena kabaina. Goa loa nipuna age ada koya paawa Boas kasa.
Oropere Boas-me aa mudunu-para pa onaa medaloma-para goa sa: Nimi rayome adalepa Abare Naomi-para Elimelek-para Kilion-para Malon aalana oyae rayo sarude. Go yapare abiare go oyae raayome neme apo kabaloda.
Agaa meda wala lano. Rut page na ore pirinalo go mealoda. Rut-re mo Moap ona Malon-me mua pirina omesade. Rut mealua rabu Malon-na su ruginiri nipuna ruru-para ina. Gore go ome aana onamere nipuna bi pa oroyala niminaina. Abia nimi apo piare royome apo adalemeda.
Onaa rayome talo: E Goa rayo apo adoa makuatema-da. Aa mudunu-mi lalo: Go onare abia nena ada-para epena gore Adaa Aa-me nipu ma-epeaina. Goa pua Resel-para Lea lapo-rupa ma-epaina. Niaa Israel ruruna aaya lapo rupa pirina. Nere Eprata ruruna adaa aa pirua Betlem suna adaa bi ina.
Adaa Aa-me nipi nogo naaki adaapu gialia. Goa pua Peres ruru-para Juda-para Tama-na sinu rupa alimi.
Gore Boas-me Rut misa-pulu Adaa Aame nipu epea pisa. Rut naaki pada pirua naaki meda madisa.
Gore onanumi Naomi gupa lakesimi: Adaa Aa-na bi minasaamina. Abiare ne naaki meda apo giade. Go naakiri nena aaya naki yapulu nipumi ne mada surubalia. Nipumi go Israel ruruna adaa bi mada mealia.
Aaya neme raana omae-pulu neme page nipu raaname waru ome. Gore neme naaki seven (7) madu i lae pare go nena aaya ona raana ome-rupa mada raana na omola pae. Go abia madu sae naakimiri ne waru suruboa onagae pirali rabu epe-rupa surubalia.
Gore Naomi-mi naaki mua repara mea saba pirisa.
Go ada onanumi goa simi: Naomi-ri naaki saba pia simi. Mo naakina biri Obet lo bi ma-asimi. Oropere Jesina aaraa pirisa. Jesi-ri Devit-na Aara pirisa.
Gore Peres na ruru pua Devit mada lo kirutu: Peres-re Esron-na aaraa pirisa.
Esron-re Ram-na aaraa pirisa. Ram-re Aminadap-na aaraa pirisa.
Aminadap-re Nason-na aaraa pirisa. Nason-re Salmon-na aaraa pirisa.
Salmon-re Boas-na aaraa pirisa. Boas-re Obet-na aaraa pirisa.
Obet-re Jesina aaraa pirisa. Jesi-re Devit-na aaraa pirisa.








































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Go buk madaare Devit-na si Israel onaana aa mudu king Solomon-me go epe agaa tu isa. Goa pua onaa epe-rupa pirinalo tu isa.
Go Epe agaa-me niaa epe kone gua niaa maredepo yalia. Go agaa rayo waru adalima rabu niaa epe kone sua epe pora ratape-rupa mogealia.
Go buk madaa iya agaa pagoa adoa ratalima rabu onaa rayome peme-rupa epe kone mua ratalima.
Go yapare aa medaloma kone rudu yalia rabu go buku madaa kone mua nimu epe kone mada mealimi. Goa pua ogegeaa medaloma epe kone mealimi-pulu epe pora mada pamualimi.
Go buk madaare aa medalomame epe kone ratinalo makuae yae mogealia-pulu epe-rupa makuaalimi. Go buk-miri niaa saa agaa page, mada-mi agaa page paga-i agaa page lagialia rabu makuae aanu-na epe pora adoa makuaalima.
<range>
Go yapare neme epe makuae yae meda mulalo paliri neme Adaa Aa madaa kone aba rulape. Aa medaloma epe kone naimiri nimu epe makuae yae meape gimeme.
Nogo naaki nimimi-ri nimina ama aapa laapo-na agaa waru pagoa ratalepape.
Nimuna agaame ne epe aa ma-aulalia. Gore epe raguna adipemede-rupa mada adipali.
Nogo naaki-nu paake pupitagi ne aanumi nimi omeme pua wae-para mea palimi waru adalepape.
Go piaene wae aanumi gupa teme: Go naaki ne aipapulu ipu. Abia niaame aa meda tamina. Niaame pora-nini suruboa aanu medaloma tu-maomamina. Nimu epe aanu epalimi page, pina pa tu maomamina. Gore niaana kone-me niminaalima yae rayo pa pamina.
Niaame nimu ora aipapulu tu-maomawa. Onaa omeme robona tu maomaina. Goa palima rabu mo onaa rogaaeme tapa-para rogaaeme-rupa pamina teme.
Go aanuna oyae luabu muare niana ada rubitabena samina.
Ne niaa raapu goanu pamina lo epaliri oyaenu adaapu mua nena ada-para rubina saina teme.
Go naaki pupitagi ne aanumi ne-para goa temere, nimuna agaa napage gimape. Nimuna go waea kone naratamea pope.
Aanuri nimu waeagu peme. Goa pua oroyalo nimumi pa onaanu agu tu-rubebe pape kone imi.
Onaame oroyalo pupitagi noalimiri nimu wae yoto mealimi. Gore yapa lokeme nipuna maa-para ope poga marayade-rupa nimuna bipa ope neme. Yaanuri ini rua, poga imi rabu adoa nimu mo poga mada naroaeme.
<range>
Go yapare mo pupitagi neme aanumiri, go kone na-i ope nape kone sua pupitagi pa noaeme. Gore nimu paake meme oyaenumi, nimu ma-oyatalia.
Epe konena porare ona meda-me pora-nini aawa page maket-nini aawa page onaa yaloaaya-rupare epe kone go-rupa epea.
Nipu adaa ada kagurena pora kerepo-para aawa page onaa adaapu kiritae-pare awa page yaloa agaa ta-rupa mada pea.
Nimi kone rudu ta onaa page, oroyalo gupa agu mada piralimi ya? Nimi maeyae onaanumi epe kone namealimiri pa ero agaa agu teme. Arabu nimimi go wae kone gimalimi ya?
Nimina wae yaenu gimaliminalo neme agaa puri pane lagialo. Naa agaa pagalimiri neme epe kone epe pora watoa rabu nimi epealimi.
Neme ni piri ipulupa loa yaato pare nimimi oroyalo gimoa naepeme.
Nimimi na epe agaa pagoa nina kone ratalepa to pare agaa rasua epe agaa gimeme.
Go peapulu kedaa adaa medaa nimi madaa epaliare neme page nimimi peme-rupa adoa gimalua. Nimi wae-rupa piralimi page neme giri laawa gimalua.
Nimi madaare kedaa adaa poripu puri pane epeade-rupa epalia. Kedaa page radaa pi yaenu epalia raburi adaa poripu magomawae-rupa epalia-ga adalimina.
Kedaa epalia raburi ni ipu loa yateme pare ni mada naepalua. Goa pua nimimi ni asapu piralimi pare nimimi ni mada na-adalimi.
Nimimi Adaa Aa-na epe kone rolo-para pirape gimeme-pulu nimi gimalua.
Nimi naa epe agaa rasua neme nimi ma-redepo yatalo-pe rabu agaa rasua gimeme.
Goa pea-pulu abiare nimina peme waea luabuna yotore nimina bipa mada mealimina.
Epe kone na-imi onaame ni maasa rilaeme. Goa peme-pulu nimu alupalimi. Goa pua nimuna bipa maeyaawa waea rayo nimumi makuaema kone imi. Go koneme nimuna bipa oyalimi.
Go yapare onaa medaloma naa agaa pagoa ratalimiri nimu epe-rupa piralimi. Goa palimiri nimu madaa wae kedaa epalia rabu nimu epe-rupa pirua mogo wae yaenu madaa na-adalimi.
Nogo naakinu nimimi naa agaa waru pago ratua, nimina kone-para waru niminaatepape.
Epe makuae-yae waru mua teme agaa rayo waru ratua epe naaki nogo mada piralimina.
Epe konena agaa ne madaa epena go agaa meape. Gore onaa yateme rabu pimide rupa mada piralimina.
Aa medame kalai-pu kogono pua no su runane pagaa i gol aana mulalo kogono radaa pina pea-rupa epe kone mulalo-re radaa pina kogono go-rupa pape.
Neme goa rayo pali-dare neme Adaa Aa-na kone rayo mada adasali. Goa paliri neme Gote page nipu kone waru rulaaye.
Gore akolo ya? Aa adaa nipuri ora oyae rayona re yade. Nipumi epe kone gua makuae yae page oyae rayo nipumi niaa guaaya.
Adaa Aa nipuna agaa pagoa rateme onaanuri wae yae epe yaenu page adoa rumaeme. Goa peme-pulu Adaa Aa-me nimu waru suruboa wae-para nalopena epe-rupa pirina tea.
Gote-me nipuna agaa pogoa rateme onaanuri nipuna surube kuta runane mapiraaya.
Nogo naaki nimi epe kone adoa ratalimi-dare epe pora luabu adoa pamualimi. Epe agaa rateme aanu medaloma page epe kone rumaawa epe pora mada mea watea.
Goa pua epe kone adaapu nena robaa-para rubialia rabu raana-me omali.
Epe kone ratali raburi epea luabumi ne raana gua ne madaa rubia kuma gialia.
Goa pua waea peme aanu-para agaa wae-rupa teme aa-nu raapu medaa-para napirape.
Go aanu nimu epe pora gimoa wae ribaane pora ratua waea puaeme.
Gore nimu wae pora ratulalo pedo pu rana omoaeme.
Go aanuna konere pugu pua bebolo maeya tea.
Gore aa medana oreme omeme pua paake nape kone salia-dare epe kone aba go agaa-para epalia. Goa palia raburi neme mogo onana kone adoa mada gimali.
Go piaene onamere abade ona inumakua pirua aani raapu ki mua pirisipide-agaa gimoa waea pape kone mualia. Gore Gote-na ini agaa madaa ora lalo loa misipide agaa page gimea.
Go rabu neme go ona rata mea pali-daare neme aba ome onaa ratamea pe.
Go ona adola peme aanu nimu oro yalo epe-rupa pirape pora gimoa wae pora ratulalo peme-pulu epe pora narateme.
Epe pora ratamea pope kone salidare neme epe pora ratua mada niminaali.
Epe aanuri go su-ama oro yalo epe pora ratua pa piralimi.
Go yapare Gote-me waea pi aanu nimu ratu talia. Gore onaame nimuna maapu-para etaa wae mea rasu rubeme-rupa nimu mea rasu rubalia.
Go naaki neme ne agaa mana lagialo-ga waru pagape. Kone narugulape pare oro yalo neme go agaa waru pagoa ratape.
Neme go agaa mana pagoa ratali raburi ne go suamaa oro yalo eperupa pirali. Goa pua ne redepone porana aawali.
Neme aa meda raapu adapua aawape page aa meda lorobaa kalape kone page waru sua aape. Go agaa luabu nena kone-para mea sua nena maa-para epe kulubu oyae ma-imi-rupa madaa masaape.
Neme goa pali-daare onaa luabumi ne raana omoa nena palide kogono epeta teme. Goa palimi rabu Gote-me page ne raaname omalia.
Neme Aapa Gote madaa kone ora waru rulaawa eperupa piraina. Neme nina bipa makuae yae madaa epe-rupa aalua kone nasape.
Neme oyae luabu pulalo paliri Adaa Aa madaa kone aba rulaawa pape. Go rabu nipumi ne epe redepone pora mea watea.
Neme nina makuae yaere ora warua-da pe kone nasape. Neme Adaa Aa madaa kone rulaawa nipuna rolo-para pirua waea napape.
Neme goa pali-daare ora epealia. Neme yaina omoa marasini nemede rabu to yogaene raba mealade-rupa mada go epe pora ratali rabu ne epe-rupa mada aali.
Nena maapu-para eta meda napeyoa poralia raburi mua Adaa Aa nipu re-para orapi-lo kalape. Goa pali-daare go madaa Adaa Aa nipu adaa bi mada mealia.
Orapi-loa pa kate rabu Adaa Aa-me nena maapu-para eta nape yae ora waru ma-opaalia. Goa pua nena ada-para eta oyae luabu rulatabalia. Goa pua nena waini-pe page rubia koya-pape palia.
Go naaki, Adaa Aa-me ne raba mulalo oyae meda palia-dare, neme ratu nayawe nena lo-robaa maepeape.
Gore akoloya? Adaa Aa nipumi raaname omea onaa-re maredepo yaaya. Niaana aapanumi nimuna nogo naakinu kone rulaawa suruboa maredepo yaeme-rupa mada pea.
Aa medame go epe kone-para makuae yae lapo mealia-daare nipu pedo pinawa.
Gore akolo ya? Ora epede silva gol page epe kone-me rabuaniaaya.
Mone yoto adaa pea aana gol page, pa oyae medaloma neme ora epeta kone sua raaname ome yaenu page rabuniaaya.
Epe kone agu suali-dare ne epe kone oro yalo sua oyae page adaapu sua go su-amaa adaalu-pu mada piruaawa onaanumi nena bi minasaalimi.
Epe koneme nena pu robaa-para raana waru gua go su-amaa adaalu-pu pirape yae page ora ma-epeaalia.
Epe koneme-re onaa epe-rupa piraama pope kone mea gialia. Gore oro-yalo kagaa piraama laama popena paa kato nona piane repena-rupa aalimi.
Adaa Aa nipuna epe kone sua go su-yaa laapo ripima warisa. Nipumi su-para ipa raku-inaloa moae kobere yaa madaa masaawa yai malopaaya.
<range>
Naa si neme gimali-ga waru adoa epe kone-para makua yae lapo waru irulu saabape.
Goa pea epe kone-para epe makuae yae laapomere ne oro yalo piraama laama pope kone gua epe pepena-rupa pua aawali.
Goa pua ne epe pora pamuali rabu oyae medame nena àà mada na-aawalia.
Ne u-patulalo pali rabu ne oyae meda pala na-omali.
Gore neme Adaa Aa madaa kone waru puri paboa rulali-dare iaa-numi ne tulalo yada salimi page nimuna agona-para ne mada na-odobali. Wae yapi-di meda waea palimide aanu madaa opopalia rabu ne napogola sali. Go piaene yapi-di nimu madaa yai-poripu laapo epea-rupa mada epea.
<range>
Aa meda oyae rudu yaliada agaa mealiare oyae adaapu saina kalape. Dia yaliare nakalape.
Nena adami aame oyae agaa mealia rabu katalo paliri, pa ogesi-da puaa adoaa nalape. Ekera wala epali rabu gialua-ga lo gorupa nalape.
Nena adami aanu ne raapu re-para pimiri, ne nimuna adami aa kone imi-ga nimuna kone nama-oyaape.
Aa medame ne-para waea napalia-dare go aa nipu raapu yada-yada napipape.
Nena kone mo yada pi aanuna pea-rupa maeyaawa nimumi go peme-a luabu naratape. Goa pua nimumi pamualimi pora rayo gimape.
Adaa Aa-me wae kone imi aanuri gimea-daa lalo. Goa pea pare Adaa Aa nipumi epe pora ratua epe kone imi aanu page nipuna epe pu-robaa kata. Goa pua nimu waru surubea.
Adaa Aa-me gupa ta: waea peme aanu luabu nimuri, nimuna ona nogo naaki luabu raapu alupalimi ta. Go yapare Adaa Aa-me epe redepone onaare nipuna ona nogo naaki oyae luabu epe-rupa suruboa raba mealia rabu epe-rupa piralimi ta.
Aa medame aa yagonu-para ero agaa teme-daare, Gote-me go aa nipu page ero agaa tea. Pare aanu medaloma epe kone-sua ae aanuri Gote-me nipuna epe kone luabu abutea.
Epe kone imi aanu-ri onaa luabumi epe bi kateme. Go yapare kone wae-imi aanuri nimuna bipa nimuna bi ma-oyatalo peme.
Go nogo naaki nimimi nina agaa waru pagalepa. Ni nimina aapa-ga, nimimi ni madaa epe kone mealepape.
Agaa neme go lagialo-re epeta-ga, nimimi narubalepape. Pa yae kone sua rubalimi raburi nimi omalimi.
Nina amame naaki meda abi namadini ni komea madu isa-pulu, nipumi ni madaa raana omea.
Gore ni oge naaki pirano aapa nipumi ni agaa mana gupa lagisa. Nina agaa nena kone-para waru mea sua go agaa ratape sa. Goa pali rabu ne ora epe-rupa piru diayali sa.
Neme epe kone mua kone-para mea rubina lape. Neme naa agaa mea rubebe pua kone narugulape.
Dia neme epe kone nagimape. Go agaame ne epe-rupa surubalia rabu ne ora epe aa pirali.
Gore neme aba ripia mealiare epe kone ora riri-nane meape. Neme oyae medaloma meaayo kone saliri epe yaere epe kone yade.
Neme epe kone raaname omoa irulu sabaali raburi, go epe kone-me ne adaa bi gialia. Go rabu ne ora epe aa pirali.
Goa pua nena aalu mada king aa mudu medana raguna nona piene adipua aali.
Go naaki neme nina agaa pagoa ratali rabu ne go su-amaa oro yalo adaalu-pu piruali.
Neme ne epe pora mea waloa epe pora-nini painalo maredepo yaayo.
Gore ne go pora ratua paali rabu oyae medame mada nama-oyaalia.
Ne oroyalo pirama lama pope agaa-re, nina agaa ya-pulu ratali rabu go-para ia agaame ne waru surubalia.
Neme wae aanuna agaa gimoa nimuna pulalo palimide-anu page gimape.
Neme go pora gimoa pogola pua su-adaalu meda-nane pope.
Gore mo waea puaeme aanumi waea meda napalimiri, nimu u-mada napatalimi. Nimumi waea palimi-daare, nimu u mada patalimi.
Wae kone-para wae pora ratua aa yagonu ma-oyapere pupitagi ne aanu nimuna eta-ne yae-rupa noaeme.
Wae aa luabu nimuna ini-para ribaa waru ta-pulu, nimuna àà koyatimi awolalo palia page mada na-adalimi. Go yapare epe-rupa redepoya piri aanuna porare nimu naare yapi-pu roa paa putalade nona piane-pare piralimi.
<range>
Go naaki nina agaa nena aane-para penaloa waru pagape.
Neme go agaa puri paloa kone-para mea sua waru irulu makuabape. Go agaa kone rugulaliri ne oyali.
Neme naa agaa pagoa ratali rabu go agaame ne epe-rupa pirama pope pora mea gialia. Goa pua go agaa-me ne ora epe redepoya mapiraalia.
Epe koneme ne maredepo yatalo nena kone-para epaliare, ipa naaku-para yokoa epeade-rupa epea. Oroyalo nena pora pamuape page nena kone wasupa luabu waru maredepo yaawa pamuape.
Neme yaa agaa na-lo wae yaenu page ora gimape.
Neme inimini na-pi mo ne palide pora waru adoa go pora ratape.
Nena kone ora epe-rupa redepo yaaina nena pora epe-rupa adoa ratua pamuape.
Neme mo epe pora pamuaaridere na-kone rugulape. Dia-ga ne popoke-nane puala wala koya-nane epala napape. Goa pua neme wae yae luabu gimapena pora adoa ratape.
Naa si neme ne ora epe agaa gua ne makuae yaenu page gua epe pora mea watalo pi.
Nena te agaa page epe-rupa te rabu nena te agaa luabu makuae aa-me ne nona-piane pagalimi.
Neme goa paliri akolo yapae? Ona medame aani gimoa ne ogeyaliari epe omeme pua rede-pi agaa medaloma lagialia-re nipu yolainalo goa palia.
Go rabu neme nipuna agaa pagoa nipu yote-daare orope go yaere wae yae yaana kone sali. Goa paliri etaame onaa imu apetabalade-rupa page wae rero pi marasini mea noa pirimi adalia.
Go piaene oname ne wae onaa omeme sunane mea palia.
Go piane ona nipuri epe pirama-lama pope supara pope kone naniminaaya. Dia nipu go wae pora yade kone page na-ia. Nipu pa wae pora kuruape mada pamuaya. Goa pua nipu pa bebolaaya.
Go naaki neme go agaa nagimi waru pagoa ratape.
Go piane ona nipuna ada poragape-para page nape. Nipu pakeaawa ne yolamonea aape. Goa pua nipu ora gimape.
Neme go onana kone adoa ratali raburi nena epe bi gimali. Nipuna aanimi ne lo-robaa mada nagialia. Dia ne pena ogegeaa aina tumaomalia.
Ne epe-yae meda mealua loa kalai-pu kogono pu su piralide yae, wala aa medame nipu mealia.
Ne yaina adaa omoa uni kebo-agitua re loa ada-para suaawa omali.
Go rabu neme gupa te: ni ora maeyaarude-ga akolo pawa pae te? Aa medalomame ni maredepo yaawa agaa wariaina lapede pawaaya te.
Neme nina mogeriae aanuna agaa rasua napagawa-rupa loali.
Abia ni onaa luabuna ini agaa madaa oyoa yala polalo te.
Nere nena ona raapu waru epe-rupa pirua pa aa medana ipa naaku-para napua nape. Goa pua nena ona raapu agu-patape. Aa meda nipuna ipa raana-para agu raapo nea-rupa nena agu raapo gupa nape.
Neme go onanu raapu nogo naakinu pa madua minarepali-dare, orope go nogo naakinumi ne mada naraba mealimi. Goa palimi-ga nena ona padaneme nena nogo naaki ora nena madu saina lape.
Neme paake naaki madu rubebe pualiri oyalia. Goa pua nena nogo naaki luabu pa onaanu raapu bebolo pitimi.
Nena ona-re nena ipa naaku rubita-rupa ya-pulu, Gote-me nena ona raaname omoa nipi raita epe agaa mana salia rabu epe-rupa pitipi.
Gore ora epe nape nanea ya-pulu oro yalo yalo ne rana gua nipuna epea luabu madaa ne ora raaname omalia. Goa pua rana waru omoa oro yalo nipuna adu mada page rana waru omape.
Go naaki neme oro yalo kone adaapu sua aa medana ona paake yolape mada kone penaloa nipuna adu oraape madaa ali-ga waru adape.
Adaa Aa-me niaame pema yae luabu page niaana ima kone luabu page aba adea-ga makuaawa aape.
Aa nipuna pea wae pupitagi luabumi nipuna maa-para ope poga sua maraaya. Nipuna go pupitagi-mi nipu mea adia konaa mada roaawa wae-rupa omolalo pea.
Go piaene aa nipuna bipa nipuna raana narabuaniaawa nipuna pea wae yaeme nipu adia maeyane aa-rupa pia. Goa puaaya-pulu nipuna bipa go pea pupitagimi nipu tumaomalia.
Go naaki aa medame pa aa medana rudu mua, nipuna bipa abula-peawi nasalia rabu neme na-abulaliri go kone epe-da dia.
Go koneme nena bipa ope poga sua nena maa-para ope aawa adibaya. Goa pea-pulu ne go rudu palia agaame ne adialia.
Go naaki ne wae yaeme adini rolo-para pirali-daare go wae yae luaburi abi gimape. Ne mogo wae aa-na pupitagi-na rolo-para napirape. Neme mogo rudu te agaa madaa yala poloa nagime. Ne pua mo palua te agaa lapaina yala napone abi pua agaa pua mupape. Goare ora aipapulu pape.
Ne u-ogeapu patu-piruae aipapu-loa abi pope.
Nena maa-para aba aaya ope poga aipapulu esepe rubape. Gore yaa-maitame nipu poga i-para pakeaawa naroalade-rupa pakeape.
Nimi ki-aa rakepea gi madini aanu nimiri neme agaa gupa lagialo. Nimi mo ini rubu-pi aame rakutanu-me pea aba adoa kone makuae aa-rupa piralepa.
Rakutanu nimuna aa mudu page nimuna surube aa page meda napimi.
Go yapare nimuna eta adaapu suaaya raburi eta diayalia rabu mea nolalo pa mea kirita suaeme.
Goa peme-ga nimi ki-aa rakepene aanu nimiri pa u-patu pirape mada raana waru pea pae? Nimi go ki-aa rakepene aanuri aa-rabu u rekataboa aalimi yapae?
Nimimi goa teme: niaa u ogesida pataluame pima pare wala ogesida kitu mua rekalima teme.
Nimimi goa palimi-daare nimina oyaenu aipapulu diyalia rabu aa naara piralimi. Paake ne aanumi nimina oyae paake meme rabu diatade-rupa pa alia.
Wae aanu nimimi yaa agaa ora waru temede.
Nimuna wae aa yagonumi adenalo gupa peme. Ne makirate rabu kimi page àà-me page inimi robo page sua nimuna waea pape agu mea wateme.
Oro yalo nimumi waea pape madaa kone rulaawa aanu medaloma kone wae ma-saaeme.
Goa peme raburi nimu kedaa adaa aipapulu meme rabu go kedaa wala ma-epeape-rupa kalai pua omalimi.
Adaa Aa-me pupitagi ne kone ipa kerepopu (7) peme-a luabu madaa-re nipumi raana na-omea.
Wae pupitagi ne-para aa yago meda adoa go aare pinawa kone imiapara, yaa agaa temena. Go page re-para aa yago meda re-nai madaa pama tumaomaeme. Nimumi waea pape madaa agu kone mapiraeme-para, waea pape-para pupitagi neme. Wae pupitagi pape madaa kone mapiraeme-para koso madaa yaa agaa adaapu teme. Go page nimuna amenu rapu agaa rado rado loa wae-kone masaeme.
<range>
<range>
Go naaki neme nena ama aapa laapo-na agaa pagoa ratape. Nipumi tepe agaa narasalepape.
Neme nipuna agaa kone-para mea sua oro yalo ratape. Go konere nena maa-para maasape kulubu-rupa masua pirali rabu ora epealia.
Ne pora pamulalo pali rabu go agaa-me epe pora mea watea. Ne u-patali rabu page go agaa-me ne surubalia. Ne u-patua rekali rabu page go agaame epe kone wasupa gua surubalia.
Nena ama aapana agaare laba paame pora mea watade-rupa mada ne pora mea watea. Nena ama aapa lapome ne go agaa lagialipi rabu go su-amaa epe-rupa aawape pora mea watepe.
Nipuna agaa-me ne rabamealipi rabu, ona wae-me ne kotulalo mada na-epalia. Aa medana oreme epe redepi agaa lagialia page napagape.
Neme go onana epenape-nane to madaa epaame naomape. Go rabu nipumi paake nalipinalo ne adoba saliaga nipu aae repara napope.
Gore aa medame paake aa rume ona raapu paake nalia-dare adaa yoto nakaloa pea. Gore pa oge etana yotosi peade-rupa mada kata. Gupa yapare aa medana ona raapu paake pupitagi no patalipi-daare adaa yoto waru rubalia. Goa pua nipuna bipa nipuna kone wasupa page tumaomalia.
