Neme aa medana lo robaa kedaa ina piru aalia rabu go aa rabamealua kone sua neme rupa-yasa te pare mo aa mada narabameali. Go piaene aa-re poripu epea rabu seti kolo rabua aipame rere madaa kiraawa peme-rupa mada yade.
Nena iaa meda reaeme omalia-daare eta kalape. Ipa nalame omalia page neme ora kalape.
Neme goa pali-daare nipuna pea wae yae mada yala mapolaeye goa pe-pulu Adaa Aa-me ne epea palia.
Po ripumi yai mea epeade-rupa mada maa agaa paeme koneme aa ratu mayawaawa ini agaa-para oke rita.
Aa medana pa konemere ada masaa pirita pea rabu nipuna onana wae ratu yawe kone page rabuaaya.
Aa medame epe agaa su adaalu-para mea epalia-daare go aa nipu ipa kogare noa lo-roba kumapu-rupa tea.
Wae aa medame epe-rupa piri aa epaa yolo bebolaalia-daare nipumi ipa karerene-para wala emaagu piade-rupa mada pea.
Gore aa meda alubi apaa adaapu no mamalia-dare naepealia. Aa medame nipu adaa bi kana kone sua kalaipu kogono pualia-dare naepeta.
Aa meda nipuna ratu yawea kone naminabaliare gore aa medame nipu rabunialia. Gopiane aare adarena pape yokapa ia-rupa mada aa yade.
Epe kone na-i aa meda adaa bi katare gore na-epe ta. Gore yai radaki raapu nare palu loapeade-rupa mada yade. Eta napeta rabu yai radaaki apaa lopea-rupa mada yade.
Aa medame pupitagi nanalia pare Gote-me go aa pa tina agaa tea-daare go agaana ini mada namadiaalia. Nimuna agaare yaanumi repena palaa madaa napiralia pare pa biyaa pamea-rupa mada yade. Goa pea-pulu ini namadini agaa teme.
Aanumi ose-mena aipapulu penalo aipuya unimi teme-rupa mada yade. Gore dogi-menana agaa-para aeyane-me pora epe-rupa ma-puaeme-rupa peme. Wae maeyae peme onaa goa napape loa teme-rupa mada yade.
Aa meda nipu epe redepone kone nasalia-daare nepara epe agaa meda natea. Goa palia-ga neme nipuna agaa na-abulape: Neme nipuna agaa abute raburi wala nipumi pea pali.
Epe kone nai aame ne-para wae agaa tea-daare nipuna agaa abulape. Na-abute raburi nipumi makua kone ora epeta kone salia.
Kone waru na-i aa meda-para go agaa laketa pu loa penatedare gore nena ne bipa ne maoyaayawa nena ke mea kepe rube nona palia.
Epe kone napiri aame epe agaa meda lano kone sua tea-daare mogo tea agaa epe-rupa mada natea. Go agaare ke wae aa-na pora pamea-rupa rado yade.
Epe kone nai aa meda aa mudu bi kateme-daare nipumi etaa madaa aana mapagaawa pitalo peme-rupa mada peme.
Aa meda epe kone nasua nipumi epe agaa meda pa lano kone sua tea-daare ipa bia neme aanumi ope etolo etolo-ae kimi ripinaae nona-palia.
Surube aame kone waru na-i aanu kogono katalo paliare onaa adaapu ae-para etaa mada pi moneaya.
Kone waru na-i aamere nipuna abade maeyae-rupa wala maeyaaya. Go peare yana-me maaku ratu ruboa wala mea neade-rupa mada pea.
Aa meda epe kone nasaliadare niaame nipu mada rabamua epe kone mogealima pae? Maria. Pare go aa nipumi oyae luabu makuaayo kone salia-dare niaame go aa agaa mana loa rabameape-rupa mada dia.
Kiaa rakepene aa nipuna adapara pa piruaawa nipumi gupa ta. Mo pora mena laiyono aaya kone sua pala omoa napea.
Kiaa rakepene aa nipumi nipuna ada runane patua pereke pereke tupia ada dua warini inisisi lego lego malaawa runane piruaaya.
Kiaa rakepene aame eta aipapulu mea nolalo nipuna ki pelete madaa ia. Goa pea pare nipu mo eta minasaawa agaa-para mea nape-rupare puri na-ia.
Kiaa rakepene aame epe kone i aa (7) kerepopu na kone rabuaayo kone ia. Goa kone sua nipumi aakone waru ia.
Gore aa laapome yada yada pua ratu yawalipi rabu aa medame nipu pua rabamealia-dare go aa nipu yana pupulaina aane pua ripinae nona pia pea.
Aa medame nipuna adami aa makiratalo puare wala orope gupa tea. Neme pa raapa agaa lawade ta. Gore maeyae aame repena agaa lusu ruboa etaane rubebe mada pea.
<range>
Repena kaapu repena ralae-para na-iralimi raburi gore repena naralia. Go page aanumi maa agaa natemere go yaweme ratu dia yalia.
Repena kaapu waru iritimi rabu repena ora waru reade. Gorupare ada pi agaa ta aamere yada agaa ora ma-adaayaya.
Niaame aa yago medana maa agaa pame rabu go agaa pagape madaare raname waru omema. Go teme agaa-re epe ta kone sua epe eta-rupa mea neme.
Aa medame epe-rupa awape agaa puri paloa tea-daare ora yapare mo konena rere waea papena ta. Gore sumi warini sosopen-rupa yapare wala silipa golme warini nona mapaaeme.
Gore aa medame aa yaago meda raname na-omaliare pa agaame makirae kone sua nimu rana omana kone inalo pea. Nipu makinae kone sua pea.
Go piaene aanuna agaare nena aaneme pagape mada ora rede waru palia pare neme nipuna agaa madaa kone narulape. Gore akolo ya? Nipuna kone pu robaa-para wae kone luabu pa rubitabea.
Nipuna pu lo robaa-para ia wae kone raayo pagaa salia pare onaa luabumi nipuna wae kone adoa makualimi.
Aa medame nipuna bipa nipu wae yaenu pa pu aano kone sua paliare nipuna bipa nipu otaa. Gore aa medame koyati pa onaa awena kone sua ia pare wala nipuna bipa mo koyati patemede-rupa mada pea. Gore aana agaare rudu madaa sone mea pea pare wala perene ipua nipu epa tea-rupa mada yade.
Aa medame aa yago meda yaa agaa medaloma laketea-daare nipumi yaa agaa loa onaa ma-oyape mada pea. Aa medame oro yalo omeme pi agaa teare gore aa yago ma-oyaatalo pea.
Neme aakone sua ekeraa goa palua loa agaa meda narogaa sape. Goa loa piraina abia paliare ne-daa namakuae.
Gore aa medame nena bi minasaaliare ora epeta pare nena bipa nena bi naminasape.
Maeyae aanuna kone epe-rupa naimi-pulu go imi koneme niaa kedaa adaa meda geme. Go epea kedaare ipa muna kedaa-para adaa aana lapome adea.
Aa medaloma ratu yawoa wae pemenumi onaa yago kedaa adaapu pa mea kateme. Goa pea pare oyae epame omoa kone wae imi konemere ratu yawoa aa meda-para wae kone imi kone luabu rabuaaya.
Waea pi aa meda maredepo rabu ne yago-rupa raana ome kone page kalo aaye.
Nena adami aanumi nimu raba meainalo radaa ora waru mea geme palo peme. Pare mo nena yada-lore aanumi epea pua ne makira teme.
Aa medame eta luabu noa pua nipuna robaa-para rubita raburi alubi apaa ora ota pare reame ome aame rero pi eta nea rabu ora mada nalia.
Gore aa medame nipuna su ada gimoa pa pora pamu aaliare yaame nipuna piri-para gimoa pa riyaa pamuaya-rupa mada pamea.
Waele-sada page ora epe wabala waele luabu pema raburi niaa mada ora epe ta kone sua pedo waru pema. Go page niaana adami aanumi niaa raana masaawa niaa rabameape kone imi epe agaa loa epea pemede-rupa mada yade.
Nena ona nogo naakinu-para nena adami aanu masaa narilape. Go page wae yae medame ne epaa mulalo paliare gore ne rabamina nena ame na-adola pope. Aa meda ne raapu repara pirali-daare go ame su adaalu-para aaya page rabuniaaya.
Naa naaki neme epe kone luabu mua epe pora luabu ratali-dare ne madaa epe kone salua. Goa pua aa medame nipara pa mariae agaa teadare neme nipuna agaa mada abutoa.
Epe kone i aamere gore nipumi ora go-rupa makuaaya. Kedaa nipu mada epolalo palia-daare gore nipumi aipapulu mapakeaalia. Goa pea pare epe kone na-i aare gore mo pora wae i-para pea rabu page go wae yaeme nipu ora mea rabu ora aipapulu kedaa mu aaya.
Aa medame mo aa yagona rudu neme abulalua loa wala naabutea-daare gore nipu wea aa yade. Go yapare mo nepara yaa agaa robali aame nepara rudu meda giaina tea rabu nipuna ta yaa agaa aba ade-ga neme mo rudu abuna kone sua oyae meda puri paboa meape.
Gore neme rui puri pabo loa nena adami aa-para ribaa reko te-dare nipu-para wae agaa temede-rupa mada te.
Aa medana ore agaa rado rado adaapu ne ona yaliare gore ada runane yai itipa-ta pogo pogo loatade-rupa mada pea.
Goa pea-pulu nipuna aanimi go agaa kone luabu magimaape-rupa mada dia. Goa peare aame poripu page wabala pepenini page ripinaalua kone sua pemedea-pea.
Nimumi puri pane aeyane nepo papere wala aeyane yagome nepo peme. Go peme-rupare aa yago medame mo aa yago rabamua epe kone masaaya.
Aa medame repenana ini etalia rabu go repenana ini raloa nalua kone salia-dare go repena ora waru surubalia. Aa medame nipuna surube aa ora waru surubalia-daare go surube aame mo aa nipuna bi ora waru minasaalia.
Aa medame mo ipa ini-para adainaalia raburi nipuna ini agaa nipuna bipa adea. Go-rupa aa medame nipuna pea rayo waru adoa rumaliare nipu gopiane aa yadelo makualia.
Gore aa adaapu omalimi page pinawa. Mo aa tapa luabu mada narulatabalia. Go-rupa mada nipuna kone-para ia yae luabu mada napu kiritalia.
Repena sulaame silipa golonu roa rakepeta. Go rupa mada go aa-re epe aa yade wae aa yade lo aba ademe. Epe aa yaliare nipuna bi minasaeme.
Gore neme epe kone nai aa puri palo tali-dare omolalo palia-rabu nipuna maeyae kone mada nagimalia.
Goa palia-ga nena mena sipsip-para meme mena luabu waru surubape.
Gore akolo ya? Nena mone-re ne raapu oro yalo mada nasapiti. Mo aa mudu pia king-na ruru page oroyalo mada napitimi.
Nena maapu-para ripu adaalu opalia-dare ponoa nena menanu nena mea sape. Goa pali rabu wala ripu kagaa opalia.
Goa pua orope nena meme mena mada yoto mua su kabaina. Goa pua mo sipisipi mena iri pudi mua marape yae wariaina.
Goa puare nena mo meme mena adu ipaa muare nena nogo naaki ona raapu nape ipaa meaina. Goa puare nena kagono onanu page mada kate.
Waea pi aanuri pama paala omo nimu pagola peme. Goa peme pare epe kone i aanuri mena laiyano aaya-rupa puri aaeme.
Kantri meda-para piri onaame nimuna gavman senisi pulalo yada palimi rabu kagaa alopape aa mudu rado re-para alopatalo peme. Go yapare aa mudu epeme surubolalo paliare ada kantri epe-rupa pa aalia.
Aa medame naraame ome aanu rabuniaatalo palia-dare gore yai adaa ipua e maapu marateade-rupa mada pea.
Rekena i agaa rasitemere wae yae peme aanuna bi minasaeme. Rekena agaa ratua pimi aanumiri waea peme aanu rabuaniaaeme.
Waea peme aanumiri epe porare ake piaene yapalo nimu ora na-ademe. Goa peme pare aa medaloma Adaa Aa ratulalo peme onaare epe pora ademe.
Aa meda nipu oyae dia yaliare epe aa yaliare amo ne aame pea luabu rabuaaya.
Ogege-aame rekena i yaenu luabu ratua palia-dare epe kone ia. Pupitagi noa yada yada pi aanu raapu aalia-daare nipuna agi aaraanu yala polo pitimi.
Aa medame mone rudu minaloa onaa repara poropete adaapu waria mealia pare mada nasaalia. Dia, pare araanu rabameme aana kinane palia.
Aa medame rekena i agaa narataliadare Gote-me go aana beten napagalia. Gote-me go betene pageare pugu waru pugu pea-pulu mada napagalia.
Aa medame epe aa meda makiraatalo paliare nipuna paliade waeame nipu wala mapiraalia. Go yapare aa meda nipu wae yae napi pawa aaliade-daare Gote-me go aa nipu epe epe yaenu mada katea.
Oyae adaapu i aanu nimu ora makuae yae ima kone imi pare naraanu kone waru sua amope aanuna kone makuaaeme.
Epe redepone aanumi nimuna kantri surubolalo peme raburi onaa luabumi go aa madaa ranaame waru omeme. Wae aanumi mo kantri surubeme raburi onaame palaa omoa nipu kaledeme.
Aa medame nipuna wae yae pawa kudiripu pa ina kone sua piraliare go aame epea napea. Go yapare aa medame nipuna wae-yae luabu lapedepealia-dare Gote-me go aa nipu odome omoa raba mealia.
Gore aa medame Adaa Aa madaa kone rulaawa piraliare nipu raana waru omoa pirina. Go yapare nipumi Adaa Aa-na agaa rasua waeanu pu piraliare nipumi waea kedaa mu-aalia.
Gore kantri surube aame waea pua naaranu rabuaniatalo paliare nipu ota. Gore mo mena laion nipumi e-adaa puri palo ta-rupa para mena beame eta asapea-rupa mada ta.
Gore mo kantri-na surube aa nipu epe kone na-i yaliare onaa luabu pa rabua tua ma-oyatalia. Go yapare adare surube aame onaa luabuna oyae nayotea pare ma-oyaape madaa gime omaliare nipu adaalupu epe-rupa pa piralia.
Aa medame aa yago tumaomalia-dare go aa nipuna tapa poaawa kedaa mealia. Goa pua nipu ora epe-rupa napiri omalia.
Gore aa medame epe kone epe pora ratua aaliare nipu epe redepoya piruaalia. Pare waenupu aalia aare aipapulu oyo tua alupalia.
E-poae aa yaliare nipuna maapu-para eta ora adaapu su aalia. Kogono radore waru na-i mada pama to tu ruboa pu aaliare nipu wae-rupa naraa pirualia.
Aa medame redeponea rataliare Gote-me go aa nipu epea palia. Aa meda nipu mone adaapu aipapulu sano kone saliare Adaa Aa-me go amope nipu epena kone na-ia. Dia mo amope aa nipu kedaa waru katea.
Na-epeta koso madaa aa meda rabamua aa meda wala malopaliare gore ora na-epe ta. Goa pea pare aa medaloma waeanu pulalo managola pimi pare mo nimu omeme pua rabameape mone ogesi kateme rabu epe-rupa giala kone na-imi.
Aa meda nipuna yaenu o waru yoa aalia-daare aipapulu amope alia. Pare nipu orope aa naraa piralua kone naia.
Gore neme aa meda maredepoyali nipumi ranaame waru omalia. Go palipide-a luabumi mo omeme kone luabu rabuaniaaya.
Gore aa medame agi araana oyaenu paake noa gupa ta. Neme go oyaenu nameawa ta. Paake nameawa ta agaare gupa aa medalomame oyaenu ma-oyaame-rupa mada yade.
Aa meda nipu oyae yoloa salua kone saliare aa adapumi go madaa ratu yawalimi. Go yapare aa medame Adaa Aa madaa kone rulaliadare go aa nipumi epe-rupa pirua oyae adaapupe salia.
Aame nina makuae oyaeme nipuna bipa madaa raba mealia kone ia pare mada dia. Go yapare aa medame epe redepone kone ratu aliare go aa nipu epe-rupa piralia.
Aa medame aa naraanu oyae pa ode kateare go aa nipu oyae mada narudutea. Go yapare aa medame mo naraa onaa adoa oyaenu naruma kateare aa nipu ota teme.
Wae agaa lo wae pora rati aanumi kantri surubalimi-dare onaa nimu kalodoa piralimi. Pare go wae aa mudunu omalimi raburi epe kone su epe pora rateme onaa nimu epe-rupa pirua surubeme.
Gore aa meda maredepo yatalo palimi pare nipu wala pa pala pitia raburi gore nipu ora aipapulu raba meape pora nasalia.
Epe redepone aa mudumi kantri surubeme raburi onaa luabumi raaname omeme. Goa peme pare wae aanumi kantri surubeme raburi onaa luabuna lo robaa-para kedaa rua re teme.
Aa medame epe kone mulalo palia-daare nipuna aapa aba epe kone masaalia. Go yapare aa meda nipu ona pake nama palia raburi nipuna mone oyaenu gopara pua rubea.
King-mi mo kantri epe-rupa surubaliare go kantri epe-rupa pa alia. Aa mudu king nipumi onaa luabuna mone oyaenu luabu nipu gina kone sua surubalia-dare kantri maoyaalia.
Aa medame nipuna adami aa omeme pi agaa tea-dare nipuna bipa nipu raape kona ma-aya.
Gore aa medame ni oyae pa gina kone salia-daare nipuna bipa nipu roape kona maaya. Go yapare aa medaloma epea peme aanu nimu raana raapu aawa yasa lo aalimi.
Epe redepone aanumi mo aa naaranuna kedaa ritimi adoa go madaa kone waru sua raba mu aaeme. Epe yae wae yae lo waea peme onaame re ora waru namakuaawa pa puaeme.
Paake pupitagi ne aanumi mo taun-para piri onaa waea peme rabu lo robaa-para radaa mapaaeme. Goa peme rabu mo epe kone redepoya imi aanumi nimu epe kone kateme rabu nimu lo robaa kuma mua epe-rupa pimi.
Gore epe kone i aame aa meda kone wae i aa koso latalo palia-daare go aa nipu ora epe kone naia. Go aa nipuri pa ratu yawe kone agu sua nipumi wae agaa loa wae pora pamuape kone padane ia.
Aa yagonu tumaomaeme aanumiri epe redepoya pimi aanu adoa rana na omeme. Go yapare mo epe redepoya pimi aanumi nimuna epe-rupa redepoya pimi aanu epe-rupa pirina kone imi.
Kone redepone na-imi aanu nimuna ratu yawe kone sua agaa teme rabu pename ta. Go yapare epe kone imi aanumiri nimuna ratu yawe kone pa nimuna lo robaa-para ina nalapedepene gimeme.
Yaa agaa ne aanumi mo kantri surube aa muduna kogono paliare mo yaa agaa ne aanu kantri-na ofisa kogono go wae aa luabumi palimi.
Aa adaame onaa luabu ini maria aya nimumi oyae adenalo pea. Adaa Aa nipumi mo naraa aanu page kaloa nimu rabuniaaae aa medaloma page kata.
Gore aa mudu king piraliade aame aa naraanuna epe redepone koso pagalia-dare oro yalo go ruruna king pa piruaalia.
Neme nena nogo naaki tua epe mana te-daare nipumi epe kone mua epe makuae yae page mealia. Go yapare nogo naakimi oro yalo nipuna raana ratua aaliare nimuna agira yala polo ma-pitia.
Waea pi aanumi kantri surubalimi rabu mo palimide wae yaenu ora adaa yalia. Go palimi rabu kantri surubalimi aanu nimu adaalupu napiralimi gore redepone aanumi adalimi gore ora peboteme.
Gore neme nena naaki epe agaa lakeloa pirali rabu nipumi nena agaa pagoa epe-rupa pitia-dare epe kone sua pirali.
Adaa Aa-me onaa epe agaa nakata pisa yalore nimu kone rado rado sua pirita peme. Go yapare aame Gote-na agaa ratua piralimiri raana raapu piralia.
Go yapare nena kogono aa-para agu agaa te-dare neme nipu mada nama epeali. Pinawa neme agaa lakete pare nena agaa mada naratalia.
Aa meda nipu epe redepone kone nasaliare gore nipu epe kone minalo marede yamina palo adamina. Go yapare aa meda epe agaa naloa pa mabebola teare gore wala maredepo yalape-rupa maralia.
Nena kogono naaki ogesi rabu nipuna kone meape yae kalamama pua yali-daare oropere aa nona palia rabu nena oyae rayo mealia.
Ratu ora aipapulu yawe aamere onaa aa radonu page ratu mayawaya. Goa pua mo ratu yawe aa nipu wae yae adaapu pea.
Aa medame nipu ora aa ayo loa nipuna aako tua bi minasaliare nipuna bi mada rabuanialimi. Aa medame nipuna bi rabuniaawa aliare orope go aa nipu adaa bi mealia.
Aa medame paake ne aa rabamealiare go aa nipu page paake ne aa nona palia. Go paliade yae amaa mea salia raburi nipu koso loa mada adialimi. Go yapare nipumi paga saliare Gote-me nipu ma-oyalia.
Aa medame aa yagonu pala omaliare go pala re ena agona-para nipu pua piri nona pea. Go yapare aa medame Adaa Aa mada kone rulaliare nipu epe-rupa mada piralia.
Aa adaapumi kantri rupara aa mudu pimi aanu omeme pulalo pemere nimu raana omena lo peme. Goa peme pare Adaa Aa-me niaana kone adoa niaana pemanu ora epe-rupa rumaawa niaa rabamea.
Epe kone rulae aanumi waea peme aanuna kone adoa raana na-omeme. Go yapare mo waea peme aanumi epe pora rateme aanu adape page raana na-omeme.
Go agaare Jakina si Agu-me Itele-para Ukal page lakesimi agaa remaa yade.
Agu-me Gote ni raapu an pirua niri aa-da dia yade sa. Goa loa niri kone-daa waru na-isa. Nina konere ora wae sa.
Ni epe kone nasu ora ni oto pare Gote nipu ora epe redepone aa yade. Pare neme nipu na-ade.
So yaa-para aapi pua su-amaa wala ipisa pae? Go page po-ripu aapina kimi ripinaa misa pae? Go page so moae madaa aapimi ipa mapiraasa? Goa pua laplap mada oyae sua aapimi keapunisa? Abia go ia su luabu apimi puri mapalaawa robo ma-sasa? Nipuna biri aapiya? Nipuna si-ri aapi ya? Go yaenuri nere makuae pae?
Oyae luaburi Gote nipuna saa rabu opesa. Gote-na Agaare ora ria yade. Goa pua nipu piri peme onaare nipumi kepopu runane yawa surubea. Gore mo etane epa aalialo ralubi maditema-rupa mada nipuna agaa-me niaa rigitaniaawa.
Nena agaa meda loare gore Gote-na agaa yade pi nalape. Gote-me orope ne koso lalia rabu go aa-re waea pi aa yade teme.
Gote nere oyae laapo agaa mulalo pi-ga neme go yae lapo giaina. Oro yalo ni go su-amaa pirualua raburi yaa agaa-para makirae kone luabu gimanowa. Neme niri amope-para aa naraa page namapirainalo-pi. Dia nina nape eta robo-para giape.
<range>
Neme oyae ora adaapu salua rabu ne masaa rilawa. Adaa Aa-nere aapi yapae toa? Ni naraa piralua raburi neme paake pupitagi noa waenu pualua rabu nina Gote Adaa nena bi ma-oyaluada go aaene lalo.
Neme surube aa piri pua kogono naakina bi napua ma-oyaape. Nipuna kogono aana bi ma-oyaali rabu Gote lorapalia rabu nipuna Gote-me ne talialo lalo.
Onaa medalome goa teme: Gote-me nimina ama aapanu ma-bebolatina teme.
Onaa madalomame nimu waea meda napema teme pare nimu amulu papubaaya-pulu Gote-na ini agaa madaa nimuna pupitagi wae ia-daa adea. Onaa medalomame nimu ora epe ta kone sua pa onaa meda otaa kone imi.
<range>
Onaa medalomame naraa onaanu-para waea agu pulalo peme. Gore nimuna agaa abulu-para rai napi eke aae ayaa-pulu nimumi mo naraa onaana oya mulalo peme.
Yaapi nea paakana oge nogo laapo pia. Nipuna biri gupa teme: Ni gi ni gi teme. Oyae maala-me nimuna raana mada na-pora poalia.
Pandanere aba ome aanuna tapa-para aeme. Laapore ore aani raapu patea pare naaki padaa napia. Repore sumi ipa adaapu mea pare ipa waru name. Maalare kone ia repena sulaame oyae luabu rea pare naare nona pea. Go yaere ora luabu madaa naniminaata.
Gore aa medame orena ama page aaraa lapona agaa rasini omalia rabu go lapome nipu mada narogaalipi. Go rabu yaa itaa-para yaa aroka roka ipua ini epa rasu nabalipi.
Oyae ipa maala ora rado pi aaene yae yapulu neme ora mada na-makuaato.
Pandanere yaa ita nipu so yaa madaa awaya. Laapore paakare nipu aana madaa pamea. Repore ipa sipi-ri adaa ipa solowara madaa pameade. Maalare aa-me ona raname omemede-rupa pipi.
Oname nipuna aa gimoa rado raapu patia raburi nipumi ipa mea radepe rubua goa ta. Neme yae meda napawade ta.
Go su-amaare yae maala wae kone ia-pulu go sumi go kone adoa gime waru omea pururu ora waru omea.
Go pemeare go-rupa: Kogono naaki naara yapare wala king kogono pea. Aa medame kone nasua eta ora adaapu nea.
Ona meda nipu aa nape pa piruaawa aba ripia aame gime ona yapare orope rumaeme. Ona nipuna surube onana kogono nipumi mulalo oyo moyo ari piralipi.
Go su-amaa yae maala raa-para pia pare nimuna kone ora epeta:
Raguta puri na-ia pare eta dia yalia rabu nape eta waru amupu imi.
Yapa wamea page aana-para pimi pare nimu puri na-ia. Goa peme pare nimuna adare aana rulalo peme.
Oboro nipuna aa muduri napia pare nimu uliri pua pameme.
Oge kaau niaame kimi ripinaawa mealimare ora yapare nimu aa mudu king-na adapara pimi.
Oyae malare padane-para wata tina pameme:
Kira mena me puri pabea-pulu pa kira anune yaenu medaloma rabuaaya. Nimu pora pameme raburi oyae meda madaa paala meme.
Yaa kuta kosapeame nipuna aalu musaawa pora pamea. Lione mena ora aari oyae meda madaa palame naomoa pare ora nipuna puri rado aaya. Meme mena yadaapunu page king medame nimu mada natalimi.
Gore neme maeyae kone sua waeanu pulalo paliri nena bi naminaasape pare agaa gimoa yalame omape.
Gore neme mena gawana adu mua mea pereke pereke te rabu bata mada autea. Aa medana ini kadu mataliri ratu yawalia. Gore yada rekalia.
Go agaa-re King Lemuel-na agaa. Agime agaa mana loa epe kone minalo lakesa.
Nina naaki nere nina madiawa-pulu neme ne raaname waru ome. Neme Gote agaa misu rabu ni gisa-da madisu. Neme ake lano ya?
Neme ona meda nayoloa money page nakaloa nena puri dia yalia. Gore akoloya king-nu ma-oyaeme-daa go agaa lagialo.
Lemuel-yo king nimi ipa waini na-nape. Nimumi bia nape kone nasalepape.
Gore nimimi ipa agu nalimi raburi rekana agaa ruguloa mo aa naraanu-para epea meda mada napalimi.
Pa bia-para waene lapo-re omape onaa-para kedaa adaapu rini onaana nape eta yade.
Go piane onaare ipa nalame omalimiri pa nalimina. Yapare nimu naraa pimi onaa oyae rudu yoa kedaa riapere kone rugulaawa nalimina.
Kedaa madaa nariape kepele pi onaare rabameape agaa lape. Goa pua mo naraanumi koso teme rabu raba meape-na puri waru pabape.
Neme koso te rabu mogo onaanu epe-rupa redepoya pagape. Goa pua neme mo naaranu raba mua surubape.
Go yapare aame ona epe kone-i rumaatalo pe? Ora yapare kalai pua asa palia. Go piaene ona-na yotore gol-na yoto pea-rupa mada yade.
Go piaene ona nipuna aanimi mo onana pea luabu epea peada aba adea. Goa pea-pulu ona-me nipu raba mealia rabu mo aa nipu oyae ora adaapu salia.
Go ona-me aani-para oro yalo epea agu pea.
Nipumi laplap wariape ope adaapu page pusua laplap adaapu wari pea.
Nimu luabumi eta ora adaapu waru imi. Gore akolo-ya? Go oname eta ora su adaalu-para mea epea. Gore mo adaa sipi-numi eta madita pemede-rupa mada mea epea.
Epe onamere yapi abi nane aina eta nipuna onaa raapu nape aba yawea. Goa puare nipuna kogono onana pape kogono robo su kata.
Mo puri pane oname su kabolalore su ora waru adoa kabea. Goa pua orope mone muare repena waene maapu kaboa poaaya.
Nipu oro meda gime naomea oro yalo puri paloa kogono puaaya.
Nipuna labana wiki ora waele waru rubia epeta rabu laba waru roaaya. Go laba roaina ribaa ruma rumane nipuna pea bisinisi raayo pua epe ta-daa adea.
Go piaaene oname ope waria nipuna bipa laplap rabuta.
Gore nipumi mo naraa onaa adoa oyaenu rudu teme rabulu kata.
Gore yai radaki adaa lopea rabu page nipuna aani nogo naaki yada dia kone ia. Gore akolo ya? Nipumi mo laplap ora epe pepena pi yae rabuta-pulu yada dia kone ia.
Goa pua nipuna ada-para sape balaket oyae page nipuna bipa rabuta-pulu nimuna ada-para epeta. Goa pua laplap kane-para yakopi lapo rata mua nipuna yamape oyae warita.
Gore mo adare-para piri aa mudunumi nipu adaa bi kateme. Nipuna aani page mo aa mudu meda yapulu goa peme.
Oro yalo mo oname epe mamina waria aako lete page waru warita. Goa pea-pulu mo bisinisi peme onaame epa kabeme.
Nipuna mogo pea kogono madaa mo ona ora epeta kone sua mo ona kone mapiraawa go piane ona yade teme. Go orope epaliade yaere nipu palame naomea.
Nipumi onaa kogono mogeatalo palia-dare pawasi agaa loa pea. Nipuna ta agaa luaburi epe kone-para makuae yae lapo ora waru rubita.
Nipuna ada-para oyae surubolalo palia raburi gime na-omea. Goa pua epe puri pane kogono pea.
Ora epeta ora epeta gore niaana ama teme. Mo ona nipuna nogo naakimi goa teme. Nipuna animi ona-na bi ora waru minasaawa goa ta.
Niaana taun-para page niana oge adarenu-nini page go piane ona adaapu pimi: Pare neme go ona luabu rabuaye teme.
Ona padaneme niaa epe rede pi agaa lagialia pare nipuna peare rado piane. Ona ora epe yalia page pinawa. Nipu oro yalo gorupa mada napitia. Goa pea-ga niaame Adaa Aa-na rolo-para pia onana bi minasamina.
Niame ona nipuna epe kogono adoa nipuna epe kone page rumaawa nipuna bi minasaeme.
King Devit-na si Jerusalem su aa mudu makuae aa pirua nipumi go buku madaa remaa tu isa.
Go makuae aame gupa sa: Oyae luaburi re naiapulu waru yaeda dia.
Niaame maali yalo kalaipua kogono pema yaena abulu ake mema pae? Kogono kalaipu pema rabu go-na ini ake mema pae sa?
Onaa omeme rabu kagaa nogo-naaki ma-aditimi mo omeme onaana pada gonumi meme sa. Go yapare go su-re pa gorupa agu pa suaya.
Naare raa ipua wala pabola popea gore wala ekeraa-nane wala epaa opeaa. Oro yalo naare epaa rala wala puala pua komome omea.
Poripu mo relapo rayo nane maowa maowa pua wala pereke tua epea-nane pea.
Ipa luaburi mo solowara madaa puaa rubita pare ipa solowara abi narubita. Gore mo ipa nipu yokoa epea-para wala pua go ipa nipu wala solowara madaa wala epea.
Niaame go su-amaa ia yaenu mada kone mapiraawa yapare gime ora wala omema. Go maditima gi-re nalapedepetema. Niaame oyae luabu ado pa agaa luabu pa pagema. Pare go pema luabumi niaa mada narabamealia.
Ora abade oyae medaloma opesa yaenuri wala orope page wala opalia. Abade aanu mi oyae medaloma pisimiri wala orope page palimi. Go su-amaa-re kagaa yae meda wala naopalia.
Aa medalomame go yaere niaa naade kagaa yaelo gupa teme. Goyapare yae ora abade isa yae pa ina na-adoa gupa teme. Go yaere niaana amame niaa abi namadini rabu go yae isa.
Aa medalomame aba niaana akuanu pirisimi rabu isa yaenu madaa kone na-niminaeme. Oyae luaburi abia niaa go piramona epea pare go kone rumaa niminape page mareme.
Niri waru makuae aa yapulu ni Israel onaana aa mudu king pirua neme nimu surube.
Gore neme go su-amaa ia yae luabu adoa waru makualua kone sua re adesatalo pua adaa radaapi kogono pe. Gopea pare Gote-me go geaa kogonore ora adaa kedapi kogono yade.
Neme go su-amaa ia yae luaburi ora aba ado kirite pare go oyae luaburi ora re naia. Aa medame poripu ratua ripinaatalo pea-rupa mada.
Oyae paaki paliare niaame wala ma-redepo yape-rupa madadia. Oyae meda nasaliare gore niaame mada nadipialima.
Ni adayoa makuae yae waru meawa-na kone sua mo Jerusalem supara pirisimi aa mudunu luabu rabuayo kone gorupa i. Ni makuae yae waru mua epe kone page waru i.
Neme ora abade epe kone-na re para maeyae kone para, eyaa kone para makuaeyae para nimuna peme kone rado rado mea makuatalo kalai pe. Pare neme poripu ratamea pe rupa mada.
Gore ora agaa riaa aa meda nipu amaa-yo makuae yae waru iare nipu madaa wae kone adaapumi ripinita. Goa puaa nipuna makuae yae ora adaa yalia raburi gore nipuna lo robaa kedaa page ora adaa yalia.
Neme epe kone sua pora pamuape madaa kalai waru pe. Nina koneme niminae yae luabu pu kiritalua kone sua pisu pare go pea re waru nai madaa pe.
Giri ne agaa-re maeyae kone meda madaa epeta kone sua pama pisuya. Goa pua epe pedo pi koneme niaa narabamea.
Epe kone-na re asapulalo neme kalai waru pe. Goa peada neme ipa waene noa epe kone mulalo kalai waru pe. Oge rudupu yapidi-na onaanu su-amaa pimi rabu epe-rupa pirina kone sua asapuayo. Nimu ora epe pora mea walawe kone sua pe.
Neme adaa ada adaapu pua kogono adaapu pisude. Waene maapu page sasude.
Neme e-maapu adaapu sawa epe redepi repena ini medaloma wai poayo.
Neme go repena wai mada koyape ipa naaku page medaloma robo i.
Neme kogono onaa adaapu kabamua, naa kogono painalo mua kogono pina-to. Go kogono pae onaana si wanenu page luabu nina kogono onaa pina-to. Jerusalem supara pateme aanumi mena gawa sipisipi go neme punitu-rupa adaapu meda napunitimi.
Neme silpa golo page nina ada kagure luabu-nini mua pa kantri luabu-para page me. Mo ada kagurena king rado rado pimi aanuna silpa golo-nu page luabu neme me. Mo onaanu page neme raana omanalo yasa lape adaapu teme. Raana omapena ona page adaapu rumaayo.
Neme go yaenu luabu mea suare ni adaa aa mudu pi. Abade mo Jerusalem supara aa mudu pirisimi aanu nimumi oyae go neme i-rupa meda na-isimi. Ni ora makuae aa go pirissu-rupa pa pi.
Nina konepara epea yaenu rayo nagimede dia. Neme oyae meda epame ome yaenuri gore ora meda. Neme aba pama pisude kogono madare raana waru omoa go ome raanare mo pe kogono-na yoto go yade.
Go yapare neme mo kalai waru pua pe kogono aba adano. Mo puayo kogono luaburi waru yaeda diayapulu re naiya. Gore aa medame poripu ratu ripinatalo pe nona pea.
Neme yae luabu pukirite-ga aa medame ni alopawa aa mudu king pitia-daare nipumi pa i kogono-re ake palia pae? Oyae meda neme napia meda mada napalia. Goa pea-daa neme epe konena pora page wae kone-na pora page adolalo pora asapuayo.
Neme kone go luabu aba ado kiritua goa kone i. Epe kone epeta, wae kone, bebo kone paa-me riba rabuaniaya.
Makuae aanumi pora waru adoa gore epeta gore ota loa waru adoa makuaeme. Goyapare maeyae aanumi ribaane pora waru rateme. Neme oyae meda ade, gore gupa: mo makuae aa nipuna kogono pu kiritea raburi maeyae aa-na kone-para makuae aana kone lapo padane pea.
Maeyae aanu madaa popea konere ni madaa page gorupa epolalo pia kone i. Goa pea-ga nina makuae yae-me niri akea pua rabamealia pae? Go madare kone wala gorupa niminaayo. Go i kone luabu waepara pawana kone i.
Oropere onaa luabumi niaa kone rugulaawa gimalimi. Niaa maeyae aanu page makuae aanu page kone rugulaawa gimalimi. Omalimi rabu maeyae aa para makuae aa-laapo mada omalipi yade.
Goa pea-pulu go su-amaa ia yae luabumi ni kedaa waru mea geapulu nina kone wasupa-me gi waru pea. Aame poripu ratu ripinatalo pea-rupa mada yapulu su-amaa pema yae luabu re meda naiya.
Neme go kalai pua pama epawade yae rayo gimaluame aba makuaayo. Gore ni alopaliade aame go yaenu rayo nipumi mealia. Goa peapulu go yae luabu mada ni gi ora waru pea.
Nina pada mealia aa-re makuae aame mealia pae maeyae aame mealia palo ni waru namakuaayo. Goyapare neme kalaipua radaa pina misude yaenu surbalia. Pare go kone luabuna re page ora meda naia.
Goyapare neme go kalapi kogono madaa lo robaa kedaa waru me.
Neme kogono pulalore nina epe kone para nina makuayae para kogono pape kina purimi mua salimi oyae-re, kogono napeme onaa katea. Gore remeda naiya pulu gore wae yae ria.
Oroyalo niaame kone ora adaapu ima pare gome niaa epe yae meda meagea pae?
Niaame go su-amaa aema raburi niaa oyae madaa lo robaa kedaa adaapu mea gea. Goame ribaa niaa u patema rabu aalu kada-para kone kone adaapu mema. Go kone page ora re waru naia.
Niaame eta ipa noa niana pema kogonona rana omema. Go page neme ade rabu Goteme gea.
Gote-me niaa eta nagulapea-daare akea pula pema pae?
Onaa medaloma Gote raaname omeme onaare nipumi epe kone kalo makuayae kalo rana kata, goyapare wae yae peme onaare Goteme oyae kiritawa inaloa Gote para epea peme onaa kanata. Gore re meda naiya poripu ripinatalo ratamea pe rupa mada.
Oyae luabu go su-amaa opeare nipuna opape yapidina opea.
Gote-me niaa onaa go su-amaa madiape di gua wala omape di page gea. Eta wai poape yapidi page gua eta naape awape yapidi page gea.
Gote-me onaa yaina maetape page aa tumaope yapidi page luabu nipumi saaya. Nipumi oyae maoyaatua wala maepeape yapidi page nipumi ama pea.
Nipumi re lape yapi di page giri lape yapidi page nipumi ama saaya. Odo omape di page yasa pawa lape di page saaya.
Nipumi onaa rapu patape yapidi page saaya rekena sua gimape yapidi page saaya. Ona ripinape page ona naorape yapidi page saaya.
Oyaenu alupae asapape yapidi page oyae alupape yapidi page saaya. Oyae waru amagepu sape di page saya oyaenu yolo rubape di page saaya.
Laplap marae riripia wala rabulape di page saaya. Agaa lorape yapidi page agaa lape di page saaya.
Di mo robaa kalape ao para di mo ratu yawape ao saaya. Yada pape page gimape yapidi page saaya.
Kalaipu kogono peme aanu nimuna meape epe yaere ake meme pae?
Gote-me niaa repara epenata kedaare neme aba ade.
Gote-me oyae luabu ora epe rupa openata. Nipumi niana kone marekaawa oyae raayo page abia opea yae abade opesa yaenu luabu makua adamonalo kone gea. Goyapare Gote nipuna pea luaburi abade page abia page niaame na-adape-rupa pisa.
Neme go mada kone padane sua epe redepota adoa pe. Go epeta konere gupa. Niaame go su-amaa pima raburi kone padane sua pedo waru pua piramina.
Eta ipa nalima raburi raana rapu awa namina. Goa palimadare Gote nipumi pa ode gi yae meda madaa rana ora waru omoa namina.
Gote nipuna peanu senisi napea-daa neme waru makuaayo. Dia go piane aure oroyalo pa su-aalia. Gote nipumi pulalo peare aa medame makibumawa mada napalia. Gote nipuna pea rayore medame na-alopalimi. Gote-me go pisare onaa luabu nipuna rolo-para pirinalo pisa.
Abia go peayaenuri abade page opesa. Yaenu orope paliade-nu page abade pesa yaenu. Gote-me abade pisa yaenu diana kone naia. Dia go yaenu wala opena kone ia.
Neme ade rabu go su-amaa yae meda gupa iya. Onaame epe kone epe pora ratua apere gimeme. Dia nimumi wae pora ora rateme.
Goteme onaanu koso latalo palia raburi neme gupa kone saayo. Epea pi waea pi onaa raayo ado kiritua rumalia kone i yapi medame.
Gore Gote nipumi niaa ko tulalo pea kone i. Niaa aanu-ri pa yaa yapanu rupa yade.
Niaa aanuna diayape pora-re yaa yapana di iya-rupa mada yade. Yaa yapanu page omeme raburi niaa onaa-rupa mada omeme. Yaa yapanu page mena oyaenu komo meme-rupa niaa onaanu page komo mema. Go yaenu luabu mada kagaa pirape kone wasupa pia. Yaa yapa aarina kone wasupa-me onaana kone wasupa narabua niaya. Nipuna kone wasupa lapo rata pa yae meda rupa yade.
Gote-me su mua warisa-pulu nipu omalipi raburi gore nipu rata wala su autepe.
Aa medalomame gupa kone imi. Onaana wasare so yaapara pea raa yaa yapa mena aarinuna wasare no su-para pea kone gupa imi. Go yaena re luaburi aapimi makuaaya?
Neme ade pare aame nipuna pea kogono rana omape pora padane gore waru yae. Goamere ora rabuaya. Niaa omalima rabu orope ake palia lo medame mada lagialiaya?
Neme wala ade pare go yaana rolopara pimi onaada wae aurime surubea. Waeya pame onaa na re ipa adawa. Goa pea pare nimu rabameape aa page meda dia. Puripane gavman-me page nimu narabamea. Mo gavmanme wae aanu rabamua epe onaa gimea.
Neme onaa aba omeme-re epeta kone go-rupa i. Akoloya niaa go abi naome pa pima onaa-re keda radorado-na rolo para pa pima-daa laalo.
Onaa medaloma go su-amaa abi namaditimi nuri nimu wini pina. Nimu go su-amaa peme wae yaenu luabu abi naademe-pulu ora epeta.
Onaame kalaipu kogono pua oyae medaloma waritimi neme ade. Gona rere nimuna adami aanumi oyae adaapu imi kone sua go kone mada peme. Goa pua nimuna adami aanumi adoa padanepara eperupa piramona kone sua maeyae kone mada peme. Gore aa medame poripu ripinatalo peme-rupa mada.
Kiaarakepea pimi aanupara gupa teme. Nipu maeyae aa pirua puri diayalia rabu omalia teme.
Pina-ga oyae ogesi mada page kone perekea lo robaa padanepara sua kogono pamina. Aame poripu ratu ripinatalo pea rupa pama kogono palialo lalo.
Neme re waru nai kone meda adesude-re gore gupa.
Aa meda nipu ame-aaraa page na-piri nipu padane awaya. Nipuna si page napia pare oro yalo kogono agu pala pirina pea. Nipu oyae ora adaapu ia pare ogesi page namea. Nipumi mogo oyae mada kone sua oroyalo kogono puri paloa pea. Neme epe raana omape di page meda naia-ga akeaene kalae pe pae kone iya. Nipuna go oyaenuri apimi mealia loa pea. Go piaene aana kone oyoa nipuna pulalo pea oyae luabu ini namadini oyalia.
Aa laapo piralipiri ora yapare aa padane agurapo piraliare ota. Aa laapo-me upayoa kogono palipiri nipuna kogono ora epealia.
Aa nipuna yago meda lopaliadare mo nipuna yago medame mada rabamealia. Pare aguraapo-ae aa madaa odo ora waru palia. Nipu rabameape aa meda diayalia.
Nipu upame omalipiri, padanepara patalipi-pulu nipu kekapu palia. Go yapare aa nipu agurapo pirualia raburi nipuna topara kekapu mada paliaya?
Aa padaneme iaa rapu yada mada pu patalia pae? Aa laapo raapure yada mada palipi. Pare aa padane rapu mada dia. Opeamape ipa repo kopatawa yoteme raburi puri adaape salia pulu go ope mada narugutea.
Epe aa naara meda king pitiadare pare epe kone meda nami kogono palia dare wae king pia.
Naaki nipu kalabus amanane ipua king epaa pia. Nipu naara naki madini yapare nipuna epe koneme mada surubalia.
Neme adalo pare king ogaeyoa omalia rabu ogege aa medame pada mua king piralia. Go suna pimi onaa luabumi go king-na rolopara pirua nipuna agaa pagoa ratalimi.
Go su-para pimi onaa luabu nipuna rolopara pitimi. Go onaa luaburi aa medame mada nadipi kiritalimi. Nipu omalia rabu orope piralimi onaame nipumi pisade kogono naniminaalimi. Go madaa page re meda naiya. Gore aa medame poripu ratu ripinatalo pea-rupa mada.
Gote nipuna ada-para polalo pali raburi mo nena peaa luabu aba waru adoa pope. Nena kone abi waru naade pa pali rabu mo opa katalo pali yaenu puri napatea. Gore kone waru nai aanumi peme-rupa mada pali. Go piaene aanumi Gote-na ini agaa madaa gore wae yae yade kone waru naimi.
Neme kone waru aba mua orope agaa laape. Neme Gote raapu agaa talo palidaare agaa waru makuawa lape. Gore akoloya Gote so yaapara pia aa-re puri adaa iya niaare puri nai onaa pima. Goa pea-ga neme Gote raapu agaa adaapu nalape.
Neme oyae mada kone adaapu mealidare epaa page palia. Goa pua neme pama agaa te raburi maeyae aanumi teme rupa agaa natapape.
Neme Gotepara ora goa palua loa agaa meda tedaare neme mo palide aure adalupu nasurubape. Mo agaa lo rogalipide yae madaa oyae meda napalire ne maeyae aa meda. Gote-me go piaene aanu raaname naomea-ga Gote rapu palua tede agaa-na ini ora mamadiape.
Neme Gote-para goa palua loa mo tedea napalidaare go peare naepeta. Gore nena tede agaa ratua ora palua kone nasalidaare neme goa palualo abi nalape.
Neme pama goa palua loa napali rabu ne sini meali. Neme Gotena kogono aa meda-para goa palua tedaare gore mo miru irini aapara agaa aba ne kone aba waru nasua lawayade nalape. Gore Gote-me ne ratu akolo yawoa nena kalaipu-pe kogono luabu maoyatina ya?
Ne epaa adaapu pi aa yalia page pama re nai kogono pu i aa yalia page ne agaa ora adaapu ne aa yalia page ne Gote nipuna rolopara oro yalo waru piruape.
Gavman aanumi naraa aanu kedaa mea gialia rabu ne nareko-oyape. Nimuna koso epe redepoya napagoa nimu epe rupa pirape pora namea wateme-daare go konena rere gupa: Pepa tea aana pea kogono adoa nimuna peme yae madaa rumawa kedaa kateme. Go opisa pimi aanu nimuna surube aa so madaa piame adoa padane rupa keda katea.
Onaa su yoto meme yae, mo opisa pimi aanu-mi nimu page meme. Mone oyae opisa nimu mua mea rumawa nimu paake meme. Mo king pia aame page onaana mone oyae paake mea iya.
Gore aa medame mone adaapu sawe kone saliadaare nipu oroyalo mone rudune pitia. Mone rana omalia aare mone adapu nasalia. Mone adapu sali page eperupa mada napiti. Go page renaiya.
Aa medana oyaeyae mada mealiadaare nipuna adami onaa epaa rulatabalia. Goa pea rabu mo aa nipuna adami onaana inimi nipu ama adabapitimi.
Kogono aana u-re kumapu patea, nipu kogono kalai puae sua page, eta adapu nanoa page. Goyapare Amane aare oyaeyae adapu kone salapirinia u napatamea.
Neme go su-amaa waeyae meda ia-da ade yae-re gupa. Aa medame nipuna raana rabuaawa oyae nakabea. Dia nipuna mone oyae waru surubea.
Orope nipuna oyaeyae luabu pua diayatabea. Goa pua nipuna naakina oyae page ora diata.
Niaana amanumi niaa madisimi raburi oyae page namea epe pa ipisima. Go-rupa agu niaa omalima rabu oyae meda namea pe pamaa palima.
Gore adaa odopi a pupima. Niaa go su-amaa oyae meda namea epe pa epema-pulu wala omoa pope page pa go rupa palima. Go su-amaa pirua kalaipu pima kogonore aa medame poripu ratu ripinaya-rupa mada.
Go su-amaa pimaa raburi ribana rupara piriua aipapulu yaina omo, keda mu, raturatu yawo go na rupara pima.
Neme abia makuatoyaere, onaame nimuna poaeme yaenu napena pedo palimiri epeta. Nimuna radapina peme kogono nare ado kaga pimi rabu. Goteme nipumi kane oyaenu.
Aa meda Gote-me mone oyaeyae adaapupe katea rabu nimu pedo rana omoa minalo kata. Nipuna kogono pedopu rana rapu minalo, go oyaeyae nuri Gotena manayaina sawa gea.
Gote-me go aa nipuna pirape yae madaa raana waru kata-pulu nipu ora epe-rupa pia. Goapeapare go aame nipu go suna rudupu pirape yana kone naniminaaya.
Neme ade pare go su-amaa pimi onaame wae kedaa ritimidaa ade. Go kedare adape ritimi.
Gote-me Aa mone mena e maapu oyaeyae adaapu waru kata. Gorabu nipu oyae meda naruduta. Go yapare Gote-me aa nipuna oyae madaa pedopu rana naomena teaa. Wala orope-re aa ruru rado medame nipuna go oyaenu mua pedo palia. Gore remeda naiya ora wae aa meda.
Gore aa meda nipuna naaki 100 maadu sua adalupu pirua, nipuna oyae mada pedo palia, nipu omalia rabu eperupa na-rogalimiri oyalia. Gore naaki meda agina robaa rupara omaliare gome rabuaniaaya.
Go piaene naaki nipuna bi meda naiya. Nipuna onaame page omea rabu kone rugulaeme.
Go naaki nipuri naarena paa page abi naadea. Nipu oyae page meda naade yapare nipu rogaeme rabu tapa-para kitu waru mua pia. Goa pea-pulu oge naaki agina robaa-para omea-me oyae adaapu sua omea aana bi rabuaniaaya.
Goa pea-pulu nipuna oyae madaa raaname naomea. Aa nipu maali adaapu 1000 o 2000 maali pirua omea pare mo agi-na robaapara omea naaki-me rabuaya. Niaa raayo omalima pare padane matmat-para palima.
Niaame eta napena kogono waru pema. Goa pema pare mo mema etame niana mada dia.
Mo makuae aame mo namaku-ae aare akeapua wini pea? Gore naara aa medame onaa luabuna ini agaa epea palia raburi gome nipu akepu rabamealia pae?
Niaame oro yalo meawe kone sua kone adaapu suaema yaenuri pinawa. Go ima kone page re meda naiya-ga gimamina. Aame po ripu ripinatalo aloma pea rupa mada. Go yapare niaame aba mema yaenu madaa raana waru omamina.
Oyae luabu pama ode-da naopea. Gote nipumi oyae luabu opena saa agaa ratua opea. Gote nipumi niaa aanuna ima kone luabu aba ado kiritea. Niaame Gote raapu udinona agaa mada natema. Gote nipuna purimi niaana puri luabu rabuaya-ga niaa pawa nipuna rolopara piramina.
Niaame agaa adalupu lo yoloalima pare goame niaa mada nawini palima. Niaame re nai agaa tema-pulu go agaa-me niaa narabamealia.
Niaa go su-amaa rudupu yapina pima. Gore naare ipua pabola popea rabu repena wasame rigitea-rupa mada pima. Goa pea-ga niaa go suna pirapere re ora waru naia. Niaame pora pamu eta no awape-rupare aapimi waru makuaya? Niaa omalima rabu go su-amaa paliade yae rayo aapimi makuaaya?
Aa medalomame ne ora epeta teme-daare gore ora waru epeta wele sada adaa yoto pea yae page rabuaniaaya. Niaa omema raburi amame niaa madita yapi di page rabuaniaaya.
Onaa omalimi rabu o-madaa piri-para palimi-mere gore eta adaa yawe para pema-rupa page rabuaniaaya. Akolo ya niaa luabu ora omalima. Goa pea-ga niaa go su-amaa pa pima raburi kone waru sua piramina.
Niaame oyae meda madaa lo robaa keda mealimare giri tema page rabuaniaaya. Gore niaana lo robaa kedaa mema raburi ini-agaa-para ribaa aba waru ta. Goa peamere go suamaa ima kone maredepo yapena epe pora mea wata.
Ne epe kone saliri onaa omeme rabu omadaa pirapere epe kone rapu mada pirali. Go yapare aa medaloma epe kone na-i aa omadaa gimoa, nimu ranarana ipara aanu rapu peme.
Epe kone-i aanumi ratu yawalimiri ne maredepo-yatalo peme. Gore epea meda, pedopua rana omeme onaana udinona kone page rabuaniaaya.
Epe kone na-i aame girilalia daare go teme girina re naia. Gore gupa ititu repena ralaaya pare somada yawe eta naralia.
Aa meda nipu epe kone salia pare aa medana oyaenu pamu yoloa mealia-daare nipu maeyane aa-rupa meda. Goa pua aa nipumi omeme pua mone oyae pamu mealiadare nipuna sabariade epe kone maoeya teapulu oyalia.
Aa medame kogono marekaa pulalo paliare gore epeta. Go yapare nipumi go kogono luabu pukiritaliare epeare go peadaa.
Neme aa meda-para ora aba aipapulu ratu nayawape. Mogo ratu yaweme konere kone waru nai aanuna kone.
Neme gupa nalape. Abade yapi diri ora epe yade pare abia go yapi diri otapi nalape. Neme gopiaene agaa te-daare ne epe makuaeyae naiya.
Go su-amaa piruaeme onaa luabumi epe kone salimiri epeta. Aaraanu omoa moae yae rumageme-rupa mada.
Epe kone-re mone-rupa ya-pulu niaa wae yapidi rabu page rabamea. Epe kone page makuae yaeme go mone-na puri rabuaya. Go epe kone makuae yaeme niaa ora waru raba mea.
Gote-me pisana oyae luabu madaa kone ora aba waru sape. Gote-me oyae meda paakipi-rupa warialo pisa-daare aapimi wala epe-rupa wariali pae?
Nena epe-rupa piti-daare gore epe-rupa pedopu piruape. Go yapare wae keda yapi di medame ne epaa mealia raburi gupa kone niminape. Goteme epe yapi di page wae yapi di page gea kone sape. Goa pea-ga wala orope epaliade yaenuri niaada namakuaema.
Nina laipiri waru yae-daa dia yapare ni go su-amaa pima raburi neme oyae rado rado adaapu ade. Aa medaloma epe pora rateme pare nimu page omeme. Aa medaloma wae pupitagi noaeme pare nimu go su-amaa adalupa pa piruaeme.
Goa pea-ga niaame go su-amaa epe redepone-aure ratua epe kone agu sape mada kone adaapu nasamina. Goa agu palima raburi niaana bipa niaa maoyaalima.
Gore niaa-me wae kone, wae pora ratape madaa, puripane kone ogeapu samina. Goa palima-daare niaana omape yae page marudu yaema.
Ne go kone laapo waru ruma adoa pora pamuape. Aa medame Gote-na surube yaena rolo-para pirinatedaare ora epealia.
Ada-re meda para aa ki laapo pegepu pirua go siti surubo alimiri go siti puri paloa aalia. Goa palia pare epe konena purimiri go ada kagure surubalimina puri page rabaualia.
Go suna epe aa meda naaya. Dia aa medaloma nimumi wae sini peme.
Neme onaa luabuna agaa napagape. Neme mo onaame teme agaa luabu pagalidare kogono naakimi nepara wae agaa tea.
Gore nena aba makuae, neme mo onaa medaloma-para wae agaa aba tede.
Neme oyae raayona re adesaato pame kalai pere ni makuae aa opolalo pe. Nina kone ruduta-pulu mada diasa.
Oyae luabu opeana re adasaatalo pua kalai waru pe. Gore niaa-me oyae mo-para ina page no rolo-para ina asapimide-rupa pe. Gore apimi mada adesaliya?
Goa pua nina uni radaa-pinaloa makuae kone rado rado adesatalo kalae waru pe. Go page neme wae pupitagi kone page maeyae kone adolalo page kogono radaa-pinaloa pe.
Asapua adawa raburi onanumi niaa kedaa waru mea geme-daa ade. Onaanumi niaa maroape kona yada waru ade. Nimuna ki-ri niaa adiape ope sene-me ade aaeme. Goa peme pare aa meda nipumi Gote madaa kone waru rulaliare go sene-me aditalo pea page yolaa-pa ina mada pogola palia. Go sene-me mo pupitagi neme aanu adialia napogola palimi.
Makuaae aa-me goa ta. Neme wae yae epe yae laapona re waru adolalo pawa kogono pe. Goa pe pare abiare re ona madaa asaa-daa waru adawa.
Neme ona epe asapawade pare meda ora naadawade. Aa ora adaapu papu papu pimi pare padane padane aanu medaloma epe pimi. Go yapare ona-re luabu ora wae pimi.
Gote-me onaa luabuna epe pora aba managolasaya-pulu nimumi kalai mada napalimi. Goa pea pare nimuna bipa peamea raayome nimu pope rupa radaa mapaeme.
Makuae aame oyae luabuna re waru makuaya. Goa peme-ga mo makuae aanu-ri aapimi mada rabualimi? Aa medana ini ribaa yalia-daare, epe paa pi kone sali aana ini agaa-para paa palia.
Neme aa king-na agaa pagoa ratape. Neme mo Gote mada makuasua side agaa rataliri king-na agaa pagoa regenaape.
Ne king raapu pirali-daare nipu ora nagimape. Neme king raapu yada pu agaa te-daare gore neme puri waru paloa nalape. Gore king nipuna bipa rana ratua palialo lalo.
King nipumi aanu luabumi nipuna agaa pagoa ratalepa te-daare gore waru ratalepape. Neme go piare akolo pae lo mada na-agaa mealimi?
Aa medame king-na agaa pagoa rataliare go aa nipu ora epe-rupa pitia. Aa nipu wale puti piraliare nipumi papea luabu-para nare inimi pea kogono page waru makuaaya.
Niaa aanuna keda medaloma salia page pinawa, oyae rayo papena pora para nareini page iya.
Orope paliade yae luabu makuapere marea. Go paliade oyae luabu lagiape aa meda naaya.
Niaa omolalo pema rabu niaana wasaa-me niaa gimoa polalo pea raburi medame mada napora-poaliaa. Niaana omape yapi di epalia page medame mada napora-poalimi. Yada peme raburi mo yada surube aame wala gimoa pupu-lo mada namea rapalia. Wae pupitagi nea aame nipuna waea aba pea-pulu nagimalia.
Neme go ade yae rayore go suna pemeda na koneme makuayo. Yapidi medamere, aa-yago rabuaniawa, waea-peme aanu rogaemeda ade.
Waeapi aa page rogaemeda ade. Wala ada pulawa mo siti para mo wae aa nipuna bi wala minasaere epeme. Gore remeda naiya da ade.
Waeapi aana rema amaa abi na epea raburi, mo onaame nimuna peme waea mada yala-poteme.
Waeapi onaa page sini peme onaa page abi naome adalupu pa aeme. Ni makuato Gote pala omeme onaa eperupa pitimi. Gore akoloya nimu Gote pala omeme pulu.
Gore akoloya, waea-pi aame Gote pala naomeapulu, nipu rapu mada napitimi. Gore nipu Gote-na surubena rolo-para napia-pulu nipu adalupu go su-amaa mada napiralia.
Go suna agaa medaloma teme pare re waru naiya. Oro medare mo epe redepoya piri aanumi wae yoto meme. Gore epe aanumi meape epe yoto wala wae aanumi meme-re neme lalo re meda naia peme.
Goa peme-daa neme epe kone epe ratapere epeta kone i. Niaame ratape epe pora meda naia. Goa pea-ga niaame ipa, etano pa epe raana raana pi-rupa awamina. Niaana pape kogono radaa pea pare niaa go su-amaa Gote-me mea gea yapi di raburi pawa epe-rupa pedopu piramina.
Neme aanumi ribaa page paa-para page puaemea adolalo kalaipu kogono pe.
Oyae raayo Gote-me pisaaya neme ado kirite pare niaame go su-amaa ia yae luabu-na re mada naado kiritema. Gore pinawa mo makuae aanumi go yae luabuna re ora aba ado kiritama teme page gore ora agaa-daa nateme. Nimumi go yaenuna re ora mada na-adasalimi.
Neme oyaenu madaa kone sua ade raburi gupa makuaayo. Gote-me mo epe aanu madaa pape aure page redepone aanu page pa aanu medaloma madaa papea page luabu aba adea. Nipu-mi oyae raana omape page raana naomape yapi di page Gote nipuna mada mea. Oyae medaloma orope ake paliare nia namakuaema.
Go yapare niaa raayo madaa epa-pe yae meda ora ia. Gore niaa Gotena ini agaa mada epea palima page ora epe redepone aa palima page ora suku suku puti aa yalia page niaa waea pi aanu yalia page o Gote nipu repara epekaapi miru irini aa yalia page niaa epe miru nairini aa luabu yalia page epe wae aa luabu yalia page Gote madaa ora yadamakua loa agaa tea-de aa mada page yadamakua natea aa madaa page epalia.
Niaa go su-amaa pima onaa luabu mada gopiane yae rayo niaa piripara ora epea. Onaa luabu go su-amaa pima raburi wae yae niaa repara ora epea. Gore gupa wae kone-para maeyae kone luabu nimina robaapara rulatabea. Goa pea pulu nimu omeme.
Raa mena laion-aba omea-mere papia yaname rabuniaya. Padane go-rupare mo papimi aanumi aba omeme aanu page rabuniaeme. Gore mo papimi aanumi nimu aba makuaawa niaare omalima kone imi.
Goa pea pare mo aba omeme aanu nimu oyae meda goa palia kone nasaapimi. Onaanumi nimu aba kone rugulaeme pare go onaa nimumi epe oyae meape mada pimi.
Onaa omeme raburi nimuna pupitagi epame omape kone page wae kone imi page oyae luabu omeme rabu diata. Goa pea-pulu go omeme onaa luabuna kogono go su-amaa meda naia.
Ne aipapulu ipa waine no lo robapara kuma pinaloa eta no raana aba meaina. Gote-me goa papere epeta loa aba ee lade.
Oroyalo neme pepena waru pua raana omoape.
Nena ore raapu rana omo eperupa piru pate page go suna re naiya. Ne go suna ape page re naiya. Goteme go suna apena yapidi geada pa goa pe.
Neme kogono meda pali-daare puri waru paloa go kogono ora pape. Gore akoloya ne omali raburi kogono pape page epe kone sape page ne makuaaeyae meape page ora mada nameali.
Neme go su-amaa oyae meda gupa ade. Aa meda alomaa pea pare oyae namea. Yada pi aanumi page nawinipeme. Epe kone sua makuae yae waru meme aanu page mone adapu nameme. Kogono radorado pu makuae aanu nimu adaa kogono nameme. Goa pua wae yapidi nimu madaa epea.
Adaa keda niaa madaa epolalo peare nadema. Kona maema rabu ya-yapa roalade rupa wae yapidimi niaa aipapulu ripinatalo agu rapea.
Neme yae meda peada ade. Go peare epe kone i aame pape kepele pia. Mo ade yaere go-rupa.
Oge siti meda aaya pare goparare onaa ora adaapu napimi. Gopara king meda nipu-na yada pi aanu rapu ipisimi. Gore mo yada pi aanumi mo oge siti kutapubasimi.
Goa peme pare mo oge siti-para aa naraa meda pirisa. Go aa nipu epe kone sua makuae yae page waru makuaya. Nipuna epe kone mada go oge siti paaya. Goa pisa rabu orope onaame mode aa naara-re wala kone rugulasimi.
Go konere niaa gupa go mea wata-daa. Epe konemere adaa puri page rabuaniaya. Go yapare onaa luabume gupa kone imi. Naara aa nipuna makuae-para epe kone page ora epe-daa dia teme. Goa loa mo aa naara-na agaa napageme.
Epe kone i aana agaa pagalima-daare epeta kone samina. Go piaene aana agaa-me rui loayaa aana agaa page rabuaniaya.
Epe koneme mo yada pape yaenu rabuaniaya. Go yapare aa padane-me waea meda pulalo paliadare nipumi oyae luabu maoyaatalia.
Puna mo wabola pabo i pe runane pua puaa omalia-dare wabola pugu waru palia. Goa pea rupare oge kone wae odabaawa epe kone i aana kone luabu maoyaatalia.
Epe kone i aame epea pulalo rapea. Go wae kone ia aa madaare epe kone meda napatea.
Mo aa nipu poranini pamea rabu page mo aa nipu aba ademe-pulu onaame go aa nipu waeyaede kone makualimi.
Nena surube aame ne ratu yawalia-daare nena kogono nagimape. Neme waea adaape pua page pawa odo pabena ali-daare nena aa mudumi nena waeyae mearuba-alia.
Aa medalomame waea adaapu peme-daa neme adoa gime. Go pemea wae yaenuri aa mudunumi peme.
Mo aa mudunumi kone epe-rupa nai aanu kogono pama kateme. Mone adaapu sua amo teme aanumi peme kogono ora naepeta.
Naraa piri kogono naakimi mena ose madaa pirua pupulaina ade. Pare pa kogono aanu pamuape rupare wala mo adaa aa mudu nimu pamualaina ade.
Aa meda nipumi su naaku adaape roboa saliare nipuna bipa go naaku-para pabalia. Aa medame ana kepo rugutea-daare paakame nipu nalia.
Aa medame ana polatua pereke-aliare aana-me nipu mada nalia. Aame repena kobealiare go repename nipu talia.
Aa meda nipuna raigapi nepo-napi pa saliare gore nipumi rai-eke naaya-pulu mo poalia repena waru nanalia. Go yapare epe kone-i aame kogono epe-rupa pea.
Aame paaka pawa epe-rupa mapirape kone sua aliare epeta. Go yapare paaka-me nipu wala nalia-daare go makuae-yae naepeta.
Epe kone-i aame agaa ora epe-rupa tedare ne epe bi meali. Ne onaa raapu wae ero agaa tedare nena bipa mabebolaali.
Go aa nipumi agaa ripima talo pea raburi nipuna talo pea agaa luabu ota. Nipuna agaa lo diayatalo pea raburi go agaa maeyaane aame ne nona pea.
Epe kone nai aamere agaa pa tea. Gore orope paliade yaenu naniminae pa agaa teme. Niaa omalima rabu palia page namakuaema.
Kone nai maeyae aa nipuna ada pope pora namakuawa kalai pama pea.
King meda pena naaki yalia pare nipuna rurumi ribaa rekoa eta yawalimidare ada kagure para kedaa adaa salia.
Go yapare king medana simi king piralia-daare go ada kagure-para piri aa mudumi nimu eta yawalia page kepele palia. Gore nimu maeyatalo-da napeme pare pa tona puri mulalo peme.
Aa meda nipu gi madua nipuna ada waru narigitaliare gore nipuna ada itipatame pabo talia.
Eta nape oyaenuri onaa, raana masape mada peme. Ipa waini neme rabu onaa lo robaa-para ora sae loa epeta kone inalo peme. Goa peme pare mone-re kogono raayo pape yae-para pema.
Nena pati ada robene-para pirua king-para ero agaa nalape. Neme nimu-para wae kone page nasape. Neme goa palide adoa yaanumi mo aa pua laketea.
Neme su adapu-para kogono waru pape orope ne epe yoto adaapu meaina.
Go suamaa wae yapidi medaloma epalia. Nena mone bisinisi adapu para saina 7-pela 8-pela bisinisi pape-para mea paga sape.
So yaa madaa moae popa rubita raburi go su-amaa yai lopea. Gore repena naare pabala-nane robalia page naare ipula-nane robalia page pa roba salia.
Ne e po sua, poripu yai epena kone surubali pare eta epe rupa nameali.
Gote nipumi oyae luabu warisa. Goa pea pulu agina robaa-para naaki akepu inagi tea palo niaa namakuaaema. Go-rupa agu Gote-me pea yae luaburi niaame mada naado kiritema.
Neme eta wai polalo paliri gore medaloma aebo poa medaloma yapipu poape. Go pea pare aebo poaede waru opea palo yapipu poaede waru opala palo waru naade. Gorupare yapipu poae-para aebo poae lapo rata waru opalia.
Paa ora epeta pulu niaa naarena paa adema raburi raana waru omema.
Niaame maali yalo go su-amaa piruaema madaa raana ora waru omamina. Niaa maali adaapuna go su-amaa piralima page go madaa kone ora narugulamina. Niaa aba ome onaana tapa-para ora maali adaapuna pirualima. Oyae luabu orope opaliade page waru yaeda dia.
Nimi ona inumakuaa, aa ogegeaa-nuri nimi pena ona inumakuaa aa ogegeaa aaeme rabu pedopu raana omo aatepape. Nimina rana ratua alimina yapare, Gote-me nimi-na pemea luabu madaa koso laliaga kone waru sua atepape.
Nimi ona inumakuaa aa ogegeaa pirape yapi diri adaalupu-da naiya. Goa pea-ga nimi kedaa mea gea yaere gimalepape. Nimina to yogaene madaa kedaa mea gea yaenu page gimalepape.
Gote-me niaa luabu warisa. Goa pea-ga nimi pena ona inumakua aa ogegeaa a-wa Gote nipu madaa kone rutalepape. Nimu kone rugulaawa alimi rabu kone perekeape-rupa maralimi. Goa pua nimi padane padane latapumi gupa teme. Nina kone wasupame raana napia teme.
Go yapi dinare nimina ini-para riba tea rabu gupa teme. Akua naare uba kedonu page waru narea pare yai epope moae page waru nasala teme.
Go yapinare nimina ki page omapaawa puri nasalia rabu pururu yata aalia. Nimina ke page omapa-wa puri nasalia rabu pulu-pulu tala-alia. Go rabu agaa imaa padane padane-si aalia. Goa pua nimimi eta puri paloti mada nanalimi. Nimina ini page ribaa yalia rabu oyae waru naadalimi.
Nimina ane page poalia rabu adaalu pare awa temede agaa mada napagali. Goa pua gigau loalia page mada napagalimi. Goa pea pare nimi patalimi raburi yaa-agaa tea padane mada pagali.
Go raburi nimi pora-nini pamuape page so madaa pirape page palame omalimi. Nimina iri page kama-iri opalia rabu pora pamuape-rupa maralimi. Oyaeme page nimina lo robaa mada namarekaalia. Goa pua nimi omali-mi rabu oroyalo piruape supara palimi. Go rabu nimina adare-para piri onaa-me odome omoa re yasa loalimi.
Goa palimi-ga nimi abi naome pa pirua Gote madaa kone rulatepape. Gore nimi laba paa udinitade rupa mada omalimi. Go page niaame ipa-no ritalo peme rabu sosopene-na igu apetaboa ipa pupubeade-rupa mada palia.
Nimina tore go su autea. Kone popo Gote nipuna gisa-pulu kone wasupare Gote nipu piri-para wala palia.
Makuae aame nipumi oyae luabu waru yaeda dia loare ogeda page naia ta.
Makuae aa nipu epe koneme rulatabisa-pulu onaa luabu go epe kone mogealia. Nipumi ora agaa ria-para saa-agaa page rumawa epere luabu buku-para mea tu isa.
Onaana anepara pagoa redeme omalimi loa buku-para popena sa. Goa pua ora agaa riaa uni mada polabaina loa tu isa.
Go makuae aanuna agaa-re rigi eke waru aayade-rupa mada. Gore mena pulubaene maredepo yaemade-rupa mada. Makuae aame go agaa buku-para mea kiritaawa tu saliare go agaa ora adaalupu suaalia. Gore nili tema rabu ripinaya-de rupa mada. Gote-re niaana surube aa pulu nipumi go agaa niaa luabu lagiala.
Nina naaki neme yae meda lagiano. Aanumi buku temere go kogono ora diayape kogono-da napeme. Neme go buku oroyalo ado pirali raburi nena to yogaene gi-palia. Goa palia-ga neme go gi-madini kone-re waru adape.
Agaa luabu madiaaya neme gupa talo pi. Niaa aanuna riri-nane palimare go-rupa: Niaame Gote padanemana rolo-para pirua nipuna pora ia-rupa luabu ratua pawa epe-rupa piramina.
Niaana puaema oyae luabu madaa Gote-me niaa adialia. Gore niaame kudiripi kone page wae kone page ima pupitagi oyae luabu pema yae mada niaa koso madaa Gote-me adialia.






































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Go remaa madaare Yesu Krais-na akuanuna bi aba gupa teme. Aba ripiare Yesuna akua Devit pirisa. Devit-na akua medare Abraham pirisa.
Abraham-re Aisak-na aaraa pirisa. Aisak-re Jekop-na aaraa pirisa. Jekop-re Juda-para nipuna amenu-para nimuna aaraa pirisa.
Juda-re Peres-para Sera lapona aaraa pirisa. Nipuna amare Tamar pirisa. Peres-re Hesron-na aaraa pirisa. Hesron-re Ram-na aaraa pirisa.
Ram-re Aminadap-na aaraa pirisa. Aminadap-re Nason-na aaraa pirisa. Nason-re Salmon-na aaraa pirisa.
Salmon-re Boas-na aaraa pirisa. (Nipuna agiri Rehap.) Boas nipuri Obet-na aaraa pirisa. (Nipuna agiri Rut.) Obet-re Jesi-na aaraa pirisa.
Jesi nipuri King Devit-na aaraa pirisa. Devit-ri Solomon-na aaraa pirisa. Nipuna agiri abade Uria ona pirisa.
Solomon-re Rehoboam-na aaraa pirisa. Rehoboam-re Abiya-na aaraa pirisa. Abiya-re Asa-na aaraa pirisa.
Asa-re Jehosafat-na aaraa pirisa. Jehosafat-re Jehoram-na aaraa pirisa. Jehoram-re Usia-na aaraa pirisa.
Usia-re Jotam-na aaraa pirisa. Jotam-re Ahas-na aaraa pirisa. Ahas-re Hesekia-na aaraa pirisa.
Hesekia-re Manase-na aaraa pirisa. Manase-re Emon-na aaraa pirisa. Emon Josaia-na aaraa pirisa.
Josaia-re Jehoiakin-para nipuna amenu medaloma nimuna aaraa pirisa. Go raburi mo Israel onaanu nimu Babilon su-para kalabus ada mapataasimi.
Nimu Babilon su-para kalabus patisimi raburi akuanuna bi gupa maasimi: Jehoiakin-re gore Sealtiel-na aaraa pirisa. Sealtiel-re Serubabel-na aaraa pirisa.
Serubabel-re Abiut-na aaraa pirisa. Abiut-ri Eliakim-na aaraa pirisa. Eliakim-ri Asor-na aaraa pirisa.
Aso-re Sadok-na aaraa pirisa. Sadok nipuri Akim-na aaraa pirisa. Akim-ri Eliut-na aaraa pirisa.
Eliut-ri Eleasar-na aaraa pirisa. Eleasar-re Matan-na aaraa pirisa. Matan-re Jekop-na aaraa pirisa.
Jekop-re Josep-na aaraa pirisa. Josep-re Maria-na aani pirisa. Maria-re Yesuna agi pirisa. Yesu nipuna biri Gote-na Mea Repae Aa (Mesaia) maasimi.
Gore abare Abraham-na ruru go pirisimi onaana epa-mama pua Devit madaare akuanuna ruru 14-pela pirisimi. Abade Devit pirisa rabu epa-mama puare nimu Babilon kalabus ada mapataasimi raburi akuanuna ruru 14-pela pirisimi. Gore mapataasimi onaana epa-mama puare Gote-na Mea Repae Aa madisa rabu go madaare akuana ruru 14-pela pa pirisimi.
Yesu Krais nipu madisa-na remaare go-rupa: Nipuna agi Maria-re aba Josep-na rumaainalo mada misimi. Goa pisimi pare Josep nipumi abi narumaasa rabu Maria-me nipu madaa Holi Spirit-mi naaki padaa pa maraasa.
Go ona nipuna polalo pi aare Josep yapare nipu ora epe aa ya-pulu nipumi Maria yala namapolaano kone isa. Goa pisa-pulu nipumi kudiri pi kone sua pawasi gimalua kone isa.
Josep nipumi go kone pa niminaaba pirina upaame Gote-na ensel meda adesa. Go ensel-me nipu-para lalo: Josep nere Devit-na si. Nena ona Maria meape paalame naomape. Paga, mo robaa-para pia naakiri Holi Spirit-mi mapiraariade.
Nipumi naaki madialia rabu nipuna biri Yesu lape. Gore nipumi onaa rayona wae yaenu mea raakepe ruboa nimu epe-rupa raba mua mapiraalia sa.
Gore Aa Mudu Gote-na agaa lakene aa meda agaa lakesa-pulu go oyae rayo apo-rupa ora pisa. Go agaa lakene aame abade gupa sa:
Pagelepa, ona inumakua meda aa raapu napatimi naaki padaa pirua naaki meda madialia pare go naaki nipuna biri Emanuel lamina sa. Go bina re-re gupa: Gote-re niaa raapu piruaaya.
Josep nipu u patua rekesa rabu mo Aa Mudu-na ensel-me lakesa agaa pagoa nipumi go ona nipuna ore-rupa misa.
Pare nipuna oname naaki padaa pa pirina nipu raapu u napatasipi. Go naaki madisa rabu Josep-me bi Yesu lo lakesa.
Maria-me Yesu Betlehem adaare-para madisa. Go suri Judia su ru-nane aasa. Go naaki nipu madisa raburi Herot nipu aa mudu pirisa. Gore aba madinaloa uba kedo madaa kone makuaae aanu medaloma mo naare opa ipula-nane pirua Jerusalem su-para ipisimi.
Epa opopaawa agaa gupa misimi: Go kagaa naaki nipu Juda onaanuna aa mudu pirape aare aa-para madia ya? Niaana su-para pirua nipu madini su waala uba kedo adoa epa amaa. Nipuna bi minasaatalo.
Gore aa mudu Herot-me go remaa pagoa pogolasaasa. Goa pua Jerusalem su-para piri onaa rayo kone adaapu isimi.
Goa pua Herot-me Gote-na miru irae aa mudunu-para rekena agaa maalape aanu-para makiritaasa. Nimu kiritasimi rabu Herot-me agaa gupa misa: Gote-na Mea Repae Aare aapina su-para madia ya?
Gore nipu gupa lakesimi: Judia su ru-nane Betlehem adaare-para madiaaya simi. Gote-na agaa lakene aame pepa madaa gupa tu isa-ga pagape simi:
Nimi Betlehem adaare-para piri onaanuri Juda su robo ru-nane pimi. Gore Juda suna aa mudununa kone madaa ora epe-rupa pimi. Goa pea-ga nimina su-parare aa mudu meda piralia. Go aamere nimi-para Israel su-para piri onaanu-para surubalia.
Go tu isa agaa pagoare Herot nipumi pawasi kaledoa mo naare ipula-nane piri makuaae aanu ipulupa lo lakesa. Goa pua go uba kedo opapariaade diri aa-rabu yaalo agaa misa.
Go agaa mua sana nipumi go makuaae aanu Betlehem adaare-para wala rapaawa agaa gupa lakesa: Nimi puare puri paloa go naaki waru asapula pulupa. Nimimi aba adasaalimiri ni piri wala epa lagialepape. Goa palimiri neme page nipuna bi minasaata palua sa.
Mo aa muduna agaa aba pagoare nimu pisimi. Go adoa ipisimi uba kedo wala epa opoa puaa-mama puare mo naaki madu saapiri ada masaa madaa pua aasa.
Mo uba kedo wala adoare nimuna pu robaa-para raaname ora waru omesimi.
Nimu ru-nane pua odobaawa simina mo naaki Maria agiaaya pua adesimi. Go rabu nimumi su adoa rumu koba pua mo naakina bi minasaasimi. Nimuna paus loboa epe kaa pi oyae medaloma pa epa kasimi. Nimumi abu pi gol aana-me warini epe yae-para paura epe kaa pi yaenu-para epe kaa pi wabola nona piane yae medaloma page epa kasimi.
Gore upaame Gote-me nimu gupa lakesa-pulu nimu Herot piri wala napisimina nimuna pora rado meda mada pua nimuna ada wala pisimi.
Nimu aba penaaloa Gote-na ensel-me ipua upaame Josep gupa epa lakesa: Nena naaki agiaaya mea pu no Isip su-para pogola pulupa. Ne go su-para piraina wala orope go su gimape yapi di epa lagialua. Abiare Herot-me go naaki asapua tulalo pia.
Gore Josep go agaa pagoa sana nipu ruma rumane rekoa nipuna naaki agiaaya mo Isip su-para mea pisa.
Josep nipu mo Isip su-para pirina Herot omesa. Josep nipu go su-para pisare Gote-na agaa lakene aanu lakesa-pulu pa pisa. Buk madaa Gote-na agaa lakene aa nipumi gupa tisaa-ya: Nina naaki Isip su-para pirisa pare neme yaasude tu isaya.
Gore abade mo naare ipula-nane piri aanumi Yesu madini su Herot nalakeloa pogola pisimi-pulu Herot-me nimu ratu yawesa. Herot nipumi mo kimisu aanu-para agaa misa rabu go aanumi mo uba kedo opasade di lakesimi-pulu Herot-me mo naaki madini di niminaawa tu maomaatalo pisa. Go raburi nipumi Betlehem su-para pirua maali laapo abi napati naaki rayo tu maomaaina sa.
Go kone madaare abade Gote-na agaa lakene aa meda Jeremaia-me abade saa agaame gupa lakesa:
Rama su adaare-parare agaa meda pagoaeme. Go agaare nimumiri re lo pirua odome omoaeme. Go rabu ona Resel-me nipuna nogo naakinu madaa re loaaya. Go rabu onaanumi go onaana pu robaa namakuma paeme. Dia-ga nipuna nogo naaki omesimi-pulu nipu re lo piruaaya.
Orope Herot aba omenaloa Aa Mudu-na ensel medame Isip su-para ipua Josep nipu upaame gupa epa lakesa:
Ne rekoa nena naaki agiaaya mea pu nimina su Israel su-para wala pulupa. Mo naaki tulalo paade aare aba omaade.
Gore Josep nipu rekoa nipuna naaki agiya mea pua Israel su-para wala pisimi.
Gore Arkelaus-me nipuna aaraa Herot alopaawa nipu Judia suna aa mudu pirisa. Gore Josep-me go remaa aba pagesa-pulu nipu go su-para pope paalame omesa. Pare Gote-me Josep upaame agaa gupa epa lakesa. Go nimu Galili su ru-nane wala pisimi.
Nipu pua Nasaret adaare-para pua pirisimi. Gore abade Gote-na agaa lakene aanumi ora agaa gupa lo mapataasimi: Nipuri Nasaret su-para piri aa simi.
Jon Batais ipua sana Judia su onaa napiri rina su-nane epa aawa Gote-na agaa lakelo aasa.
Gore nipumi lalo: Gote-na Surube Suri aba re-para go epea-ga nimina pupitagi nape kone gimalepa sa.
Abade Gote-na agaa lakene aa Aisaia-me Jon madaa agaa gupa sa: Aa medame onaa napiri su-para aawa agaa gupa yaatea: Aa Mudu nipuna poranu waru wari salepape. Nipuna pamuape pora maredepo yatepape sa.
Jon nipumi abade kamel menana iri maraawa mena yoganeme warini aako let-me rabuniaawa yamesa. Goa puare nipumi mata-para alubi aapa-para asapu no pirisa.
Go rabu mo Jerusalem su-para Judia su rayo-para piri onaanumi ipa Jordan repaa-para piri onaanu page Jon nipu piri-para ipisimi.
Ipuare nimuna waeanu lapedepe ne agaa lakesimi rabu Jon-me ipa Jordan-para baptais kasa.
Yapare Jon nipumi Farisi aanu-para Sadyusi aanu-para nimu baptais minalo adesa. Goa pua nipumi nimu gupa lakesa: Nimiri wae paakame madini aanu pimi. Aapimi nimi gupa lagia ya? Gote-na orope ratu yawape konere nimimi adobaawa piralimi. Go ratu yawe konere nimimi madaa pogola palimi ya?
Nimimi epe kogono pipape. Nimimi goa pua kone rulalimi-daare ora kone rulae onaanu pitapape.
Nimina robaa-parare Abraham-re niaana Aapa kone nasalepape. Neme nimi lagialo: Go ia aana-re Gote-me Abraham-na sinu mada ma-aulaalia.
Rai gaapiri repena re-para aba apo ia-daa ini waru namadialiade repenare pitaa poa repena sulaa-para mea iralia.
Nemere nimi kone perekealiminalo pa amaa baptais gialo. Pare orope epaliade aa medamere Holi Spirit-na purimi repena sulaa nona piane yae raapu baptais gialia. Niri raba mi aa ya-pulu neme go aa-na aariti esepea kege radepetalo palua pare mada dia.
Nipuna lama saapia nipuna kimi ripinua aaya. Goa pua mo wit-na ini raapu ripu raloa go epe ininu agu mua nipuna kiritape ada-para sulalo palia. Gore wae ripuri aipapulu nauduni repena sulaa-para mea iralia rabu pa roalia sa.
Go raburi Yesu nipumi su Galili gimoa ipa Jordan-nane ipisa. Nipu Jon piri pua Jon-me baptais kanalo pisa.
Goa pisa pare Jon-me Yesu gupa lakesa: Neme ni baptais gialiri epe ta-ga akeane neme baptais gialua pae?
Gore Yesumi nipu agaa gupa abusa: Palaina abiare neme toade-a pape. Niaame goa palimi-daare Gote-me pamina ta rayo palima. Goa sa-pulu Jon-me nipuna agaa ratisa.
Yesu nipu baptais aba mua aipapulu nipumi ipa Jordan gimoa so repaa-nane ipisa. Goa pua Yesumi gupa adesa: Yaa-para pora gaape lobesa rabu Gote-na Holi Spirit yaa puluma nona piane biyaa ipua nipu madaa epaa pirisa.
Go rabu agaa meda yaa-para gupa laniaasa: Gore nina si-ga neme nipu madaa ora pedo waru pisa.
Go raburi Holi Spirit-mi Yesu nipu onaa napiri su-para mea pisa. Go rabu Satan-me nipu kone adolalo ko tisa.
Yesu nipu raa-para yapi 40-pela pirua eta nanisa-pulu reame omesa.
Go rabu Satan-me ipua sana Yesu-para goa sa: Nere ora Gote-na Si yaliare neme te rabu go aana-me bret aunialoa mea na sa.
Go raburi Yesu nipumi agaa gupa lakesa: Gote-na buk madaa agaa gupa ia: Onaanumi bret agu noa epe-rupa napirualimi pare Gote-na lagi agaa rayo waru pagoare oro yaalo epe-rupa pitimi sa.
Go raburi Satan-me Yesu nipu wala so epe Jerusalem siti-para lamua pisa. Gore nipu ora so lotu adaa masaa madaa lamu pua goa lakesa:
Nere ora Gote-na Si yalia-daare gore ne go lotu ada masaana aawa su amaa epa pogolape. Gore Gote-na buk madaa agaa gupa ia: Gote-me ne madaa nipuna ensel-nu lakeloa ripinaatepa tea rabu ne waru suruboa kimi ripinaabalimi. Goa pea-ga pogolali-daare aana-me page nena aa mada natalia sa.
Gore Yesumi nipu goa lakesa: Gote-na agaa i buk madaare agaa meda gupa ia: Neme nena Mudu Gote-re kone adolalo nakotape ta.
Satan-me Yesu wala mea puare ora so pore medana eke madaa pua aaware su rayona i yaenu Yesu walabesa.
Gore nipumi Yesu gupa lakesa: Neme ni madaa rumu koba pua nina bi minasaali-daare go su amaa ia yae rayo ne gialua sa.
Go rabu Yesumi nipu goa lakesa: Satan nere pane pu. Gote-na buk-mi agaa gupa ta: Nena Mudu Gote padane pia-ga nipu padanena bi minasaawa nipu padanena kogono pape.
Go raburi Satan-me Yesu nipu gimenaloa Gote-na ensel-numi nipu raba mula ipisimi.
Yesumi Jon kalabus ada mapataarimi remaa pagesa-pulu nipu Galili su-para pisa.
Gore nipu Nasaret su-para napirisa pare Kaperneam su-para pua pirisa. Kaperneam suri ipa Galili ini repaa-para aasa. Go Kaperneam adaare-re Sebulun-para Naptali su lapona robo rikiraana aasa.
Gore aba Gote-na agaa lakene aa meda Aisaia-me laama ipisa agaa ratua pa amaa ipisa.
Sebulun su-para Naptali su lapo-para piri onaanuri nimina su lapona porare mo ipa repaa-nane pua ipa Jordan-na mone pane aina. Go su laapo-parare ora Galili su robo ru-nane aasa pare ruru rado onaa adaapu pirisimi.
Go su ribaane-para pirisimi onaanu nimumi epe adaa paa adalimi. Onaa rayore omape su ribaane-para piri onaanu nimi pimi-para paa ora epalia.
Go raburi Yesumi nipuna epe agaa ripima lakesa: Gote-na Surube Su ora re-para go ipula-ga nimimi wae kone gimoa lo robaa perekealepape sa.
Yesu nipu ipa Galili ini repaa-nane pamuala aasa rabu nipumi ameaya lapo adesa. Go ameaya lapore Saimon Pita-para ame Andru lapome ena meape kogono pua agona pa amaa pisipi.
Gore Yesu nipumi lalo: Nipiri ni raapu baina. Go ena meapena-rupa nipimi onaa mealipinalo mogealua-ga ipulupa sa.
Gore nipu lapome aipapulu mo ena agona gimoa nipu raapu pisipi.
Nipumi wala ogesi-daa pua ameaya lapo meda adesa. Nipu lapore Sebedi-na si Jems-para Jon ameaya pirisipi. Nipuna aaraa Sebedi raapu ipunu madaa pirua nimuna ena agona rabu lala pirisipi. Yesumi nipu lapo ipulupa sa.
Gore nipuna Aapa page mo ipunu page gimoa Yesu rata mea pisipi.
Nipu Galili su rayona pora pamula pisa. Goa puare nipumi Juda aanuna lotu adanu-para onaanu Gote-na surube suna agaa pamu mogeasa. Gore nipumi Gote-na Surube Su madaa epe agaa pamu lakeloa sana mo onaanu nimuna yaina rado rado maperekeaawa nimuna yogane maepeaasa.
Goa pisa-pulu nipuna bi so Siria su robo rayona piri onaanumi pago kiritisimi. Go onaanumi pago kiritaawa nimuna yaina rado rado-para radaame ome onaa page mea ria ipisimi. Nimuna yainare wae remo nimu madaa pirua maeya ne onaanu page pirua uni rayo oma pae page nimu mea ipisimi. Yesu nipumi nimu rayo maperekeaa kiritisa.
Go rabu ora onaa adaapumi Yesu rata mea pisimi. Nimuna suri Galili-para adaare Dikapolis-para Jerusalem su-para Judia su robo ru-nanepara ipa Jordan-na mone pane piri onaanu-para ora rayore agaa pagoa rata mea pisimi.
Yesu nipumi mogo onaa adaapu adoa nipu so rudu madaa opasaawa pua pirisa. Go rabu nipuna disaipel onaanu padane-para epa pirisimi.
Go rabu Yesumi nimu agaa gupa lakesa:
Nimi rayona robaa-para epe kone mulalo pirua niminaalimi-daare raana omo piralimina. Gote-na Surube Su nimimi ora mealimina.
Nimi rayome re lo pi-daare pedo pu piramina. Gore Gote-me nimina robaa-para kuma mapainaalo goa palimina.
Nimi rayome nimina bi rabuaniaalimiri gore pedo pu piramina. Gore nimiri Gote-me su rayo gialia.
